title: Archeologists find musket balls fired during 1 of the first battles in the Revolutionary War
content: CONCORD, Mass. — Nearly 250 years ago, hundreds of militiamen lined a hillside in Massachusetts and started firing a barrage of musket balls toward retreating British troops, marking the first major battle in the Revolutionary War. The latest evidence of that firefight is five musket balls dug up last year near the North Bridge site in the Minute Man National Historical Park in Concord. Early analysis of the balls — gray with sizes ranging from a pea to a marble — indicates colonial militia...

Kazayı görenlerin ihbarı üzerine olay yerine AFAD, itfaiye ve sağlık ekipleri sevk edildi. Otomobilde sıkışan yaralılar, ekiplerin yardımıyla çıkarılarak sağlık ekiplerine teslim edildi. Ambulanslarla Besni Devlet Hastanesine kaldırılan yaralılardan Gökhan Kaya yapılan müdahalelere rağmen kurtarılamadı.

creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Bradley Jolly)

title: Nữ sinh Đồng Tháp đạt điểm 10 Ngữ văn: Học đều các môn, từng thi học sinh giỏi Tiếng Anh

title: 衞生署牙科診所—帳委會:優化安排未能解決長時間排隊輪候 促研設定求診者資格
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 立法會政府帳目委員會今天(17日)向立法會提交報告,分別公布「緊急牙科服務和長者牙科護理支援」及「提供和監察復康巴士服務」兩項聆訊結果。帳委會主席邵家輝指,緊急牙科服務的籌數由2018至2019年度約4萬個,大幅減至2022至2023年度的約2萬個,他提及衞生署在2022年9月實施新安排,在服務當天凌晨12時為市民作初步登記預留籌號,市民可於早上返回診所取籌就診,但此安排未能解決有市民長時間排隊輪候的情況。 帳委會對此表示極度關注和不滿,強烈建議當局檢討現時提供緊急牙科服務的做法,並探討是否可設定求診者的資格,例如設定入息水平,以確保資源用得其所。 另外,邵家輝指,帳委會關注為長者提供參加牙科外展服務計劃的多個非政府機構的服務達標率參差,而關愛基金的長者牙科服務資助項目在2018-2019年度至2022-2023年度的實際受惠人數,亦較估算為低。帳委會強烈建議當局積極與非政府機構及資助項目的推行機構加強溝通,務求令每一位有需要的長者均可獲提供服務。...

title: A Gaza father mourns his baby boy, killed in bed by an Israeli airstrike
content: The dead Palestinian toddler’s limbs were pale and cold despite the sweltering summer heat in Gaza. Outside the hospital, his father cradled the boy in his arms, unable or unwilling to say goodbye. Flies circled and landed in the child’s soft hair. “What did he do wrong, my God? What did he do wrong?” screamed Mahmoud Mikdad, his voice hoarse, lifting his face toward the sky. His son, Yaman, was killed by an Israeli airstrike. title: Guatemalan family seeks return of relative's body more than a decade after he disappeared in Mexico
content: Nearly a decade after Guatemalan authorities were told that Mexico had sent the wrong body to a Guatemalan family searching for their missing teenage relative, that unidentified body is still buried in Guatemala and the family’s relative is lying in a Mexico City morgue. The family, which declined to comment through its lawyer, wants 17-year-old Yovanny back, but also wants the body it buried exhumed, identified and returned to their relatives. title: Маск анонсировал переезд штаб-квартиры SpaceX
content: Американский миллиардер, основатель космической компании SpaceX Илоон Маск сообщил в своем микроблоге в социальной сети Х о переносе ее штаб-квартиры. По его словам, компания покинет штат Калифорния, ее новым местом дислокации станет космодром Starbase близ города Браунсвилл в Техасе. Основанием для принятия подобного решения Маск назвал изменения в законодательстве и введение запрета для школ информировать родителей в случае, если их ребенок начинает идентифицировать себя как трансгендера,...

title: Danh tính chuyên gia trang điểm là 1 trong 6 người Việt chết ở Thái Lan
content: Theo Bangkok Post , ngay sau khi vụ án xảy ra, danh tính 6 nạn nhân đã được xác nhận. Theo đó, có 2 người Mỹ gốc Á là Dang Hung Van (55 tuổi) và Chong Sherine (56 tuổi). Bốn nạn nhân còn lại là người Việt gồm: Nguyen Thi Phuong Lan (47 tuổi), Pham Hong Thanh (49 tuổi), Tran Dinh Phu (37 tuổi), Nguyen Thi Phuong (46 tuổi). title: शंभू बॉर्डर खोलने की डेडलाइन खत्म: किसान करेंगे दिल्ली कूच, 15 अगस्त को देश भर में ट्रैक्टर मार्च
creator: न्यूज डेस्क, अमर उजाला, चंडीगढ़
content: वहीं फरवरी से डटे किसानों ने हाईकोर्ट के आदेश के बाद दिल्ली कूच का एलान कर दिया है। संयुक्त किसान मोर्चा गैर राजनीतिक के सदस्य जगजीत सिंह डल्लेवाल ने कहा कि वह शंभू सीमा खुलते ही दिल्ली के लिए कूच कर देंगे। 15 अगस्त को ट्रैक्टर मार्च निकालने का भी फैसला लिया गया है। यह ट्रैक्टर मार्च देश भर में निकाला जाएगा।

title: Food Recipe: घर पर तैयार करें 5 मिनट में बनने वाली ये खास डिश, आसान है बनाने का तरीका
content: अधिकतर लोग शाम 4 बजे के समय चाय के साथ चटपटा खाना पसंद करते हैं. ऐसे में हर कोई ऐसी डिश बनाना चाहता है, जो कम समय में जल्दी बनकर तैयार हो जाए. आप भी कम समय में बनने वाली रेसिपी खोज रहे हैं तो पालक चीला रेसिपी को फॉलो कर सकते हैं. यह सेहत के लिए भी बेस्ट मानी गई है. पालक पिज़्ज़ा बनाने के लिए आपको पालक के पत्तों को धोकर बारीक काटना होगा, फिर इसे मिक्सर में पीसकर पेस्ट तैयार कर लें. अब आप एक बड़े बर्तन में बेसन, पालक पेस्ट, हल्दी पाउडर, लाल मिर्च पाउडर, जीरा, धनिया, प्याज, नमक, हरी मिर्च डालकर...

title: В Якутии учредили знак отличия для семей, проживших в браке не менее 50 лет
content: ЯКУТСК, 17 июля. /ТАСС/. Знак отличия "Семейная доблесть" учрежден в Якутии для семей, отмечающих юбилейную дату супружеской жизни и проживших в совместном браке не менее 50 лет. Об этом сообщил глава Якутии Айсен Николаев в своем Telegram-канале . "Семья - самое ценное в жизни человека. content: અનંત અંબાણી અને રાધિકા મર્ચન્ટના લગ્ન થઈ ગયા છે. શુક્રવાર 12 જુલાઈ 2024 ના રોજ અનંતે તેની મંગેતર રાધિકા મર્ચન્ટ સાથે ફેરા ફર્યા. તેમના ગ્રાન્ડ વેડિંગની હાલમાં માત્ર ભારતમાં જ નહીં પરંતુ દેશ-વિદેશમાં પણ ચર્ચા થઈ રહી છે. આ કપલના લગ્નમાં બોલિવૂડથી લઈને હોલીવુડ, રાજકારણથી લઈને રમતગમત ક્ષેત્રની અનેક હસ્તીઓએ પણ હાજરી આપી હતી. અંબાણી પરિવારે અનંત-રાધિકાના લગ્નમાં આવેલા મહેમાનો માટે ખાવા-પીવાની ખાસ વ્યવસ્થા પણ કરી હતી, જેની એક ઝલક અમે તમને બતાવવા જઈ રહ્યા છીએ. જેમાં અનેક પ્રકારની વાનગીઓનો સમાવેશ...

title: Грозы и жара до 37 градусов ожидаются в Воронежской области
content: Ближайшие дни, с 17 по 19 июля, в Воронежской области ожидается опасное метеорологическое явление – сильная жара. Максимальная температура воздуха достигнет 35-37 градусов. На территории региона пройдут дожди с грозами. Погоду области будет определять антициклон. Об этом сообщил местный гидрометцентр. Сегодня в среду, 17 июля , на территории Воронежской области ожидается переменная облачность. Без существенных осадков. Ветер северный 6-11 м/с. Днем прогнозируется сильная жара: 32-37°. В...

title: Assam: Three militants killed in intense encounter with security forces in Cachar
content: Three militants were killed in an encounter with security forces in Assam's Cachar district late on July 16. The incident took place in the Bhuban Hills on the Assam-Mizoram border. Reports indicate that three militants were shot dead during the exchange of fire. Earlier in the day, three militants were arrested with weapons in Dhalai Ganga Nagar, Cachar. title: Singapore landlord gets 10 months’ jail for using pinhole cameras to peep on Malaysian tenant showering, changing clothes
content: SINGAPORE — A landlord installed eight pinhole cameras around his flat so that he could watch his female tenant in acts such as changing her clothes and using the bathroom. Poon Lee Daniel, 68, a Singaporean, was sentenced to 10 months’ jail after pleading guilty to one charge of voyeurism and another charge of possessing a voyeuristic image. content: Lindsey Harding is leaving the Kings organization to join the Lakers’ coaching staff, according to ESPN’s Adrian Wojnarowski . title: Elon Musk says California gender ID law 'final straw' as he moves HQs to Texas
creator: Sky News
content: Elon Musk has said California's new gender identification law was the "final straw" and that he is moving the SpaceX and X headquarters to Texas. The billionaire posted on X on Tuesday that he plans to move SpaceX from Hawthorne, California, to Starbase, Texas, and X to Austin from San Francisco. The new law, signed on Monday by California governor Gavin Newsom, bars school districts from requiring staff to notify parents of their child's gender identification change. title: Telangana to waive crop loans up to Rs 1 lakh on July 18
creator: IANS
content: Telangana Chief Minister A Revanth Reddy on Tuesday, July 16 announced that crop loans of up to Rs 2 lakh will be waived on the basis of land passbooks of farmers and that loans up to Rs 1 lakh will be waived on July 18. His announcement came after opposition parties criticised the guidelines, under which food security cards issued by the Civil Supplies Department were declared mandatory for farmers availing of the scheme. creator: GARY D. ROBERTSON
content: RALEIGH, N.C. (AP) — North Carolina’s election board voted Tuesday to certify a political party that wants to put Robert F. Kennedy Jr. on the state’s presidential ballot this fall. The panel rejected a similar petition effort by a group backing Cornel West, citing questions about how signatures were collected. title: Евсеев: «Микаутадзе «взрывается» лучше, чем Кварацхелия»
content: Бывший защитник сборной России Вадим Евсеев сравнил нападающих сборной Грузии Хвичу Кварацхелию и Жоржа Микаутадзе. «Микаутадзе «взрывается» лучше, чем Кварацхелия. Я говорю именно об игре с места. Я не могу сравнить с кем-то Кварацхелию или глубоко проанализировать его игру. Да, сегодня ценятся футболисты, которые умеют обыгрывать один в один. Хвича — один из них», — цитирует Metaratings.ru Евсеева. На Евро-2024 23-летний Микаутадзе забил 3 гола и сделал одну голевую передачу.

title: Man rescued after spending night stuck on Yarra River embankment in Kew
creator: Clareese Packer
content: An injured man has been rescued after spending the night stuck on a Yarra River embankment. A man slipped and fell into shallow waters near Studley Park Rd in the Melbourne suburb of Kew on Tuesday night. He remained stuck until Wednesday morning when a nearby resident found him. The 55-year-old man was unable to pull himself free due to a leg injury as temperatures dropped down to a chilly 8C overnight. Fire Rescue Victoria central operations commander Mitch Simons told the Herald Sun the man...

title: CM Revanth congratulates mountaineer for scaling Mount Kang Yatse (II)
creator: The Hans India
content: Hyderabad: Chief Minister A Revanth Reddy on Tuesday congratulated the young mountaineer from the Tribal community hailing from Mahbubabad district, Bhukya Yashwanth Naik, who had scaled Mount Kang Yatse (II), which stands at 6,250 metres above sea level in Ladakh. Earlier, Revanth Reddy who recognised the talented youngster from the Tribal community, had awarded him Rs 5 lakh through Telangana Sports Authority. Naik has already scaled Mount Kilimanjaro (Africa), Mount Elbrus (Europe), Mount...

title: Trump se deja ver en la segunda jornada de la Convención Republicana
creator: EFE
content: El expresidente de Estados Unidos y candidato republicano Donald Trump apareció este martes por sorpresa en la segunda jornada de la Convención Nacional de su partido a tiempo para escuchar los discursos de sus principales rivales en las primarias: Nikki Haley y Ron DeSantis. title: Doda Encounter: जम्मू संभाग में सात माह में हमलों में 12 जवान बलिदान, 10 नागरिक भी मारे गए; पांच आतंकी हुए ढेर

title: Hơn 725.000 người ở TPHCM sẽ chuyển về phường mới sau sáp nhập

content: Salesforce has laid off 300 employees as part of the software giant’s broader effort to streamline operations, reports Bloomberg. title: Тренер Новиков оценил игру Кочеткова в составе «Каролины» в прошлом сезоне НХЛ
content: Заслуженный тренер России Юрий Новиков оценил игру российского вратаря Петра Кочеткова в составе «Каролины». «Я уже говорил, что пока Кочетков не станет первым номером в «Каролине», ее шансы на Кубок Стэнли останутся очень маленькими. Но это не означает, что ему просто так должны дать место первого вратаря. Он сам должен стать одним из лучших вратарей НХЛ. Мечта должна быть длиннее, чем руки. title: Aashadhi Ekadashi 2024 : चंद्रभागेच्या तीरी, उभा मंदिरी, तो पहा विटेवरी, पंढरपुरातील विठूरायाचं रुप खुललं!

title: США могут лишить права на проведение Олимпиады в 2028 и 2034 годах
content: ЛОНДОН, 17 июля. /ТАСС/. Всемирное антидопинговое агентство (WADA) может лишить Антидопинговое агентство США (USADA) статуса соответствия, что приведет к запрету на проведение крупных соревнований, в том числе Олимпийских игр в 2028 и 2034 годах. Такое мнение высказал почетный президент WADA и член Международного олимпийского комитета Ричард Паунд, комментарий которого приводит агентство Reuters . title: Microsoft's hiring of former Inflection AI staff prompts UK probe
content: Britain's competition regulator has started a formal investigation into Microsoft's hiring of some former staff of Inflection AI and its partnership with the startup, it said on Tuesday. Over the past 18 months, regulators around the world have increasingly focused on potentially anti-competitive behaviour in the AI industry, with Microsoft's various deals with smaller startups facing mounting scrutiny. In March, the tech giant hired Mustafa Suleyman, co-founder of Google DeepMind, as head of...

title: Red Bull Reportedly Puts a Condition in Front of Sergio Perez Amidst Threat of Sacking
creator: Anirban Aly Mandal
content: Sergio Perez signed a two-year contract extension with Red Bull earlier this season, amid an abysmal run in form. There is no confirmation that Perez has to be within 100 points of Verstappen after the Belgian GP, as previously claimed. title: DWP urges pensioners to take action or face payment delays as they start retirement
creator: newsdesk@men-news.co.uk (Katie Elliott, William Morgan)
content: The state pension serves as a crucial financial lifeline for people who have reached the age of retirement, with around 12.7 million people in the UK currently benefiting from it. Yet, many on the cusp of retirement may not be aware that the state pension isn't dispensed automatically by the Department for Work and Pensions (DWP). content: به گزارش ایسنا، همچنین در این نظرسنجی مشخص شد که شهروندان آمریکایی نگرانند که انتخابات پنجم نوامبر ریاست‌جمهوری باعث خشونت بیشتر سیاسی شود. به نقل از خبرگزاری رویترز، این نظرسنجی ۲ روزه مشخص کرد که میزان اختلاف بین «دونالد ترامپ» به عنوان کاندیدای انتخابات ریاست جمهوری آمریکا با «جو بایدن» به عنوان کاندیدای دموکرات‌ها تنها سه درصد یعنی ۴۳ به ۴۱ درصد است و این مساله مشخص می‌کند که ترور نافرجام رئیس‌جمهور سابق تغییر شگرفی در احساسات و نگرش رای دهندگان ایجاد نکرده است. اما ۸۰ درصد از رای...

title: कार के सनरूफ से बाहर निकलने पर मनाही, तो फिर इसका क्या है काम?
content: दुनियाभर में लग्जरी गाड़ियों का क्रेज तेजी से बढ़ रहा है. बीते कुछ सालों में सनरूफ गाड़ियों का क्रेज भी बढ़ा है. लेकिन अगर कोई व्यक्ति सनरूफ से सिर निकालकर घूमता है, तो पुलिस उसका चालान काट देती है. अब सवाल ये है कि आखिर कार में सनरूफ क्यों दिया गया है और इसका इस्तेमाल किस काम के लिए किया जाता है. आज हम आपको बताएंगे कि सनरूफ का इस्तेमाल क्यों होता है. सनरूफ कार आज के वक्त अधिकांश कार के टॉप मॉडल में सनरूफ आ रहा है. लेकिन आपने देखा होगा कि जब कोई सड़कों पर सनरूफ के बाहर सिर निकालकर घूमता है, तो...

title: ダムに車転落、女性が心肺停止 助けようとした男性が行方不明 長野
content: 17日午前8時55分ごろ、 新開の黒川ダム黒川渡橋付近で、「車が落ちたようだ」と木曽消防署から木曽署に通報があった。落ちたのは軽乗用車で、車内から20代の女性が見つかり、町内の病院に運ばれたが、心肺停止という。また、女性を助けようと、ダムに飛び込んだ60代ぐらいの男性と連絡が取れていないという。 警察や消防などによると、女性は現場近くの看護専門学校に通う生徒とみられるという。女性とみられる声で学校に「車ごとダムに落ちた」と電話があり、学校が消防に通報した。行方不明の男性は学校の職員という。署が事故の原因を調べている。 ※無料期間中に解約した場合、料金はかかりません

title: DSE放榜2024—英華女學校誕全港唯一「女超級狀元」 冀升讀醫科:因喜歡與人交流
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 中學文憑試(DSE)今日(17日)放榜,今屆DSE全港只有一位女超級狀元,於英華女學校誕生。超級狀元劉翯悠考獲7科5星星,中英數主科、選修科生物、化學、歷史和M1均奪得5星星。今年文憑試以公民與社會發展科代替通識科,她認為公民科只分達標與不達標,令她心理壓力較小,更容易成為超級狀元。 劉翯悠期望大學升讀醫科,「想讀醫嘅人最重要係鍾意同人交流」。對於今年文憑試以公民與社會發展科代替通識科,她稱沒因此感到遺憾,認為因為公民科只分達標與不達標,所以心理壓力較小,而且更容易成為超級狀元。 考獲7科5星星的佳績,劉翯悠感謝父母的陪伴,以及校長和老師的悉心栽培,她在放榜前更寫了感謝信並附上自己的畫作,送給校長。 記者 溫樂汶 相關新聞: DSE放榜2024—一文睇清今屆八間「狀元搖籃」 10名尖子身份陸續曝光! DSE放榜2024—喇沙書院誕兩狀元 其中一名超級狀元將赴英修讀經濟金融及數據科學 DSE放榜2024—考生為「好意頭」手持星島日報等放榜 寓意「升到」大學 DSE放榜2024|學友社建議考獲邊緣分數同學要做兩手準備 青協兩日接近800宗求助或查詢

title: US women’s soccer team fights the heat, plays to goalless draw against Costa Rica in final Olympic tuneup
creator: Stephen Whyno
content: WASHINGTON — The heat was on for the US women’s soccer team’s final exhibition tune-up game before the Paris Olympics, with sweltering temperatures in the air and plenty of chances to score. The goals did not come in a 0-0 draw against Costa Rica on Tuesday night, just the second time — and first since 2015 — the US did not win its last game before a major tournament. title: 吳善揮 - 多元品德教育活動 成就陽光正向少年|學友智庫
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 品德教育向來予人一種流於說教的刻板印象。這是因為不少學校都以單向方式來教導學生品德價值,使學生失去對品德教育的學習興趣。這種填鴨式的課堂不但無助學生理解不同品德情意價值的內涵,而且更不能讓他們反思不同行為在道德上的對錯。 事實上,品德教育應以多元化的模式施行,一方面為學生創設不同情景,讓他們明白所學意義,另一方面以知(明理)、情(動情)、意(堅定)、行(實踐)為主軸,為他們帶來多元體驗,讓他們在滿滿的學習興趣下,建構健康的價值觀。 筆者也於校內實施多元品德教育活動,以照顧不同學生的學習需要和興趣。在認識價值方面,我們以德育課為基礎,兼採融入式教學(於各學科滲透品德教育)教導學生多元的品德價值內涵,如誠信、感恩、堅毅、孝親等,讓他們理解這些品德價值之重要意義。在引發情感方面,我們運用多元化的教學活動,以引發他們的學習興趣,例如通過設計反貪海報,增進學生對誠信的認知;以華語流行歌曲賞析活動(以小肥《負親》為教材)引發學生對孝親價值的反思;以戲劇活動(如良心胡同)引導學生思考道德兩難的處境;運用繪本《海的另一頭》引發學生對他國人民處境的關注。...

content: 서울 지하철 6호선 삼각지역에서 조명등을 설치하던 50대 노동자가 감전 사고로 숨졌다. 서울 용산경찰서에 따르면 17일 오전 8시50분 서울 용산구 삼각지역에서 서울교통공사 용역업체 직원 A씨(56)가 LED 등을 설치하다가 감전사고를 당했다. A씨는 심정지 상태로 심폐소생술(CPR)을 받으며 병원으로 이송된 후 오전 10시50분 숨졌다. 경찰에 따르면 A씨는 녹사평역과 삼각지역 사이의 집진기를 관리하는 사무실에서 LED 등을 설치하다 사고를...

title: Sheinbaum anuncia que Paco Ignacio Taibo II continuará al frente del FCE
content: La presidenta electa de México, Claudia Sheinbaum, informó que Francisco Ignacio Taibo II se mantendrá como director del Fondo de Cultura Económica (FCE). Por su parte, Paloma Saiz seguirá como coordinadora de la Brigada para Leer en Libertad. A través de sus redes sociales, Sheinbaum escribió: "Llegaron de visita dos grandes amig@s y compañer@s. title: Autobus se u Peruu strmoglavio niz liticu od oko 200 metara, najmanje 25 putnika poginulo
creator: HINA
content: Najmanje 25 putnika autobusa je poginulo, a 17 ih je ozlijeđeno u prometnoj nesreći koja se dogodila u utorak u Peruu tijekom putovanja kroz planinsko područje, izvijestio je regionalni zdravstveni odjel Ayacucha. "Autobus je u zoru skliznuo s autoceste u andskoj regiji Ayacucho u Peruu, prevrnuo se i strmoglavio niz strminu od oko 200 metara", izjavio je je za državnu novinsku agenciju Andina šef odjela za zaštitu autocesta Jhonny Rolando Valderrama. title: Ryan Garcia Considers Japan Exhibition During Boxing Ban
creator: BoxingNews.com
content: Ryan Garcia could take up an exhibition in Japan in December while he serves his one-year boxing ban. Garcia is banned after testing positive for Ostarine after his win over Devin Haney . The ruling overturned Garcia’s win into a no-contest, meaning he cannot box until April 2025. That was a massive blow to Garcia, who had just secured the biggest win of his career, making him the face of boxing. Since then, his behavior has divided fans further. Garcia was banned by the WBC following racial...

title: Von wegen demokratisch – jetzt stellt sich auch das Silicon Valley hinter Trump
creator: Laurin Meyer
content: Das Silicon Valley galt als Bastion der Demokraten. Doch zahlreiche wohlhabende Gründer und Investoren sind nun umgeschwenkt und stehen offen hinter Donald Trump. Auch an der Wall Street gibt es erste Anzeichen eines Umschwungs. Und es könnte längst nicht das Ende sein.

title: Over 3.38 lakh perform Amaranth Yatra in 18 days
content: Jammu: Over 3.38 lakh devotees have performed the ongoing Amarnath Yatra so far as another group of 3,740 pilgrims left for Kashmir on Wednesday amid tight security. Shri Amarnathji Shrine Board (SASB) officials, who manage the affairs of the annual Yatra, said that over 3.38 lakh devotees had ‘darshan’ inside the holy cave shrine during the last 18 days since the Yatra started on June 29. “Another group of 3,740 Yatris left Bhagwati Nagar Yatri Niwas in Jammu today morning in two escorted...

content: В Минобороны РФ сообщили, что на одном из участков в зоне проведения специальной военной операции подразделения группировки «Север» захватили и зачистили позиции Вооруженных сил Украины. title: बैंककको पाँचतारे होटलमा ६ जना मृत भेटिए
content: थाइल्याण्डको बैंककस्थित पाँचतारे होटलमा ६ जना व्यक्ति मृत भेटिएका छन्। मंगलबार बैंककको ग्राण्ड ह्यात होटलको पाँचौं तलाको एउटै कोठामा ६ जना मृत भेटिएका हुन्। चौबिस घन्टासम्म उक्त कोठामा बसेकाहरूले काउन्टरमा सम्पर्क नगरेपछि र निर्धारित समयमा चेक आउट नगरेपछि होटलका कर्मचारी उनीहरूको स्थिति बुझ्न गएका थिए। बैंककको मेट्रोपोलिटन पुलिस कमिश्नर थिति सेङस्वाङका अनुसार मृत भेटिएकाहरूलाई विष सेवन गराएको हुनसक्ने बताएका छन्। सबै मृतकहरूको शरीरमा कुनै पनि चोटपटक नदेखिएको र कोठामा सेतो पाउडरजस्तो देखिने...

title: 「錶之銀河」劍指香港一哩錦標
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 伍鵬志鎮倉寶「錶之銀河」榮膺今季最佳四歲馬,此駒季內曾勝出獅子山錦標及精英碟兩項三級賽,目前評分高達一一九分,是本港評分最高的現役四歲馬。 「錶之銀河」馬主楊建文的女兒楊潔怡和兒子楊俊建代表父親頒獎,楊潔怡和楊俊建說「錶之銀河」下季目標是進軍各項分級賽,包括十二月香港一哩錦標,至於其他細節,要由父親(楊建文)與練馬師商量再決定。 按圖睇有關相片: 陳嘉甜

title: Director del INA asegura que promueven ocupaciones de tierra
creator: Diario La Tribuna
content: “Hay varios alcaldes de todos lados que están promoviendo las ocupaciones de tierra, al igual que “hay otra gente gruesa”, para enriquecerse», denunció el director del Instituto Nacional Agrario (INA), Francisco Fúnez. Las invasiones promovidas por los alcaldes son a «orilla de la calle, las mejores propiedades urbanas donde el pisto (dinero), va a fluir para venderlas”, reiteró. title: Charles III. verliest Regierungserklärung des neuen Premiers
content: LONDON (dpa-AFX) - Der britische König Charles III. (75) verliest am Mittwoch die Regierungserklärung des neuen Labour-Premierministers Keir Starmer. Das traditionelle "State Opening of Parliament" gehört zu den wichtigsten Terminen im politischen und royalen Kalender in Großbritannien. Es wird stets mit großem Pomp und teils skurril anmutenden Traditionen begangen. title: Cleric's inter-faith mass-marriage plan sparks protests in Bareilly, probe ordered
content: BAREILLY: A protest erupted in Bareilly on Tuesday after a prominent local cleric announced his plan to mass-marry Hindu women to Muslim men , prompting police to order an investigation and assure residents that peace would not be disrupted. The cleric sought permission from authorities for these marriages, which he claimed involved "women already in live-in relationships with Muslim men." title: VIDEO : गाजियाबाद में ईवीएम मशीन की सुरक्षा में तैनात सिपाही ने गोली मार की आत्महत्या
content: गाजियाबाद के मुरादनगर में नगर पालिका परिषद में ईवीएम मशीन की सुरक्षा में तैनात सिपाही पम्मी ने सरकारी रायफल से गोली मारकर आत्महत्या कर ली। सिपाही एक युवती की ब्लैकमेलिंग से परेशान चल रहा था। पुलिस कमिश्रर अजय मिश्र ने घटनास्थल का निरीक्षण किया। नगर पालिका परिषद परिसर स्थित गोदाम में ईवीएम मशीन रखी हुई है। जिनकी सुरक्षा में दिन और रात दो दो सिपाही की डयूटी लगाई जाती है। मंगलवार रात वर्ष 2018 बैच के सिपाही पम्मी पुत्र प्रवीण कुमार निवासी औरंगाबाद जनपद बुलंदशहर व सिपाही ध्यान सिंह मौतला की डयूटी...

title: 2024 Lok Sabha elections: Shiv Sena (UBT) moves HC over Ravindra Waikar’s poll victory
content: Shiv Sena (UBT) leader Amol Kirtikar on Tuesday moved the Bombay High Court challenging the Lok Sabha election victory of Ravindra Waikar, candidate of the Shiv Sena led by Eknath Shinde. In his petition, Kirtikar, who lost by a wafer-thin margin of 48 votes, sought to set aside Waikar’s election as the Member of Parliament from the Mumbai North-West constituency, alleging lapses in the counting process. title: Wirecard-Prozess: Dritter Angeklagter will Schweigen brechen
content: MÜNCHEN (dpa-AFX) - Eineinhalb Jahre nach Beginn des Wirecard-Prozesses will der bislang schweigsame frühere Chefbuchhalter des Konzerns sich an diesem Mittwoch erstmals zu den Anklagevorwürfen äußern. title: Indian 2 box office collection day 5: Kamal Haasan-Shankar’s box office bomb sinks into single digits, mints Rs 65 cr
content: Indian 2’s box office collection on day five saw the film stabalise after a massive fall on the critical first Monday, but not in a way that will helps the Kamal Haasan-starrer in salvaging its performance. The Shankar-directed movie earned just Rs 3 crore on its fifth day of release, according to industry tracker Sacnilk. With this, the total five-day collections of Indian 2 stand at Rs 65.15 cr. title: Sports News | Rafael Nadal is on the US Open Entry List, Although That Doesn't Mean He Will Play There
content: New York, Jul 17 (AP) Rafael Nadal was on the U.S. Open entry list released via a protected ranking, although that doesn't necessarily mean he will compete in the year's last Grand Slam tournament. Nadal has been dealing with injuries the past two seasons and playing sporadically. title: Yusuf’ta sınır sorunu
content: Avusturya kampında göz dolduran Yusuf Demir için bu performansı yeterli olmayacak. Avusturya Milli Takımı 'nı tercih eden 21 yaşındaki gurbetçi, ancak 12 yabancıdan biri olarak sarı-kırmızılılarda kalabilir. Kontenjanı dolu olan Galatasaray 'da Tete, Oliveira ve Dubois 'e kulüp aranıyor. Yabancı sağ bek ve 8 numara alacak sarı-kırmızılı takımda yer kalmayan Yusuf kiralık gönderilecek.

title: Gençlere şartlı izin
content: Bulgarıstan pasaportuna sahip Baran Aksaka'yı Bulgaristan ekibi FK Arda 'ya kiralık göndermeye hazırlanan Galatasaray 'da genç oyunculara teklifler geliyor. Florya ürünü Ali Yeşilyurt , Işık Kaan Arslan , Eren Aydın , Jankat Yılmaz , Batuhan Şen ve Berk Balaban şu an Avusturya 'da kampta A Takım 'la beraber çalışıyor. Fakat bu oyuncuların da oynama şartıyla gönderilmesi bekleniyor.

title: Ara vermek yok
content: Aslan yeni sezon hazırlıklarını dün yaptığı antrenmanla sürdürdü. Dinamik ısınmayla başlayan antrenman, iki grup halinde 8'e 2 pas çalışmasıyla devam etti. Okan Buruk yönetimindeki antrenman, topa sahip olma çalışmasının ardından çift kale maçla sona erdi.

title: Nwakaeme hazır
content: Yeniden takıma katılan Anthony Nwakaeme , transferi sonrası eksikleri olduğu için takımdan ayrı bireysel antrenmanlar yapıyordu. Deneyimli oyuncu kısa sürece açığı kapatırken tamamen takımla antrenmanlara çıkmaya başladı. Nwakaeme'nin kısa sürede hazır hale gelmesi özellikle teknik direktör Avcı'yı mutlu etti.

title: Haller listede
content: Hücum hattına önemli yıldızları dahil eden Beşiktaş , son bir hamle daha yapmak istiyor. Borussia Dortmund 'dan ayrılması beklenen Sebastian Haller listede durmaya devam ediyor. 30 yaşındaki Fildişi Sahilli golcü için temasların süreceği ve deneyimli yıldızla beraber forvet transferinin kapanacağı belirtildi.

title: Jevtovic Konya’da
content: Konyaspor , orta saha Jevtovic ile 2 yıllık imza attı. İmza töreninden sonra konuşan Jevtovic, " Konya benim ikinci evim diyebilirim. Burada çok güzel dostluklar, arkadaşlıklar edinmiştim. Tekrar Konya'da ve Konyaspor'da olduğum için inanın çok mutluyum" dedi. Gaziantep FK'den ayrılan 30 yaşındaki Sırp ön libero, Konyaspor'a 2018-19'da geldi ve 2 sezon boyunca 91 maçta forma giyerken, 9 gol, 2 asist yaptı. Geçen sezon Gaziantep ekibinde 34 maçta 3 gol attı.

title: Tosun'dan 2 yıllık imza
content: Fenerbahçe , Cenk Tosun 'la 2 yıllık sözleşme imzalandığını KAP'a bildirdi. Açıklamada, "F.Bahçemiz, kadrosunu Cenk Tosun ile güçlendirdi. Kendisini 2 yıllığına Sarı Lacivert renklere bağlayan sözleşmeye imza attı." denildi.

title: TRANSFER HABERLERİ | Fenerbahçe'de Ferdi Kadıoğlu için kritik plan!
content: Fenerbahçe'nin yerli yıldızı Ferdi Kadıoğlu, EURO 2024'teki performansı sonrası Avrupa devlerini peşine taktı.

title: İzin bitti mesai başladı
content: Avusturya kampından sonra iki gün izne çıkan sarı-lacivertli futbolcular, dün Samandıra'da top başı yaptı. Teknik Direktör Jose Mourinho önderliğindeki antrenmanda Lugano maçının taktik çalışması üzerinde duruldu. Jose 'nin hırslı oluşu ve oyuncularını sık sık uyarması dikkatlerden kaçmadı.

title: İngiliz ekibi Barış Alper Yılmaz için dev rakamı gözden çıkardı!
content: Galatasaray, sezonu 102 puanla rekor kırarak şampiyon tamamladı. Sarı-kırmızılı ekip, ligi ezeli rakibi Fenerbahçe'nin önünde bitirdi ve 24'üncü şampiyonluğunu ilan etmiş oldu.

title: Szalai, Arabistan'a
content: Karadeniz devi, Fenerbahçe 'nin eski stoperi Attila Szalai ile anlaşmış ancak Hoffenheim 'in yeni başkanının satın alma opsiyon maddesini yükseltmesi nedeniyle beklemeye geçmişti. 26 yaşındaki Macar savunmacı için Suudi Arabistan 'dan bazı takımların devreye girdiği kaydedildi.

title: İyi bir ikili olabiliriz
content: Cimbom 'un yeni transferi Michy Batshuayi , gelecek sezona dair konuştu. BeIN Sports 'a röportaj veren Belçikalı oyuncu, Mauro İcardi 'yle çift forvet oynayabileceğini belirtti. Batshuayi, "Kendisi çok büyük oyuncu. Ama özelliklerimiz farklı. Birbirimizi tamamlayan forvetler olduğumuzu düşünüyorum. İyi anlaşırsak iyi ikili olursak çok güzel sonuçlar ortaya çıkacak" dedi. 30 yaşındaki oyuncu sözlerini şöyle sürdürdü: "Okan hocayla iyi bir iletişimimiz var çünkü...

title: Hazırlıklar sürüyor
content: Beşıktaş'ın Slovenya kampı devam ediyor. Siyah beyazlılar çalışmalarını sürdürüyor. Dün günü tek antrenmanla geçen Kartal , teknik direktör Giovanni van Bronckhorst yönetiminde çalıştı. Koşu ve ısınma çalışmalarıyla başlayan antrenman, pas ve şut idmanlarıyla devam etti. Antrenmanın son bölümünde ise taktik ağırlıklı çift kale maç oynandı.

title: ManU reddetti
content: Geçtiğimiz günlerde Manchester United 'ın İskoç orta sahası Scott Mc - Tominay için Ada'ya çıkarma yapan Galatasaray , beklediğini bulamadı. Mirror'da yer alan haberde, ManU'nun Galatasaray'ın teklifini reddettiği bildirildi. 27 yaşındaki orta saha için 20 milyon pound isteyen İngiliz deviyle önümüzdeki günlerde bir görüşme daha yapılabilir. Fakat bu transferin artık gerçekleşmesinin zor bir ihtimal olduğu konuşuluyor. McTominay, Okan Buruk 'un orta saha adayları...

title: Kingsley Coman Fenerbahçe'ye mi transfer oluyor? Yıldız isimden flaş karar!
content: Alman basını, Fenerbahçe'nin kadroya katmak için girişimlerde bulunduğu Kingsley Coman ile ilgili son durumu duyurdu.

title: Ozan hedefe kilitlendi
content: Yeni transfer Ozan Tufan , sezonun başlamasını iple çekiyor. Yeni bir meydan okuma hedefiyle Süper Lig 'e dönen 29 yaşındaki orta saha, kampın en sıkı çalışanlarından biri. Abdullah Avcı 'nın, birçok mevkide oynadığı için 'Seni 6 transfer gibi görüyorum' dediği Ozan , kendisine güvenenleri mahcup etmemek için büyük gayret gösteriyor. Disiplinli ve azimli çalışmalarıyla dikkat çeken 8 numara, kupalar kazanmak ve yeniden A Milli Takım'ın vazgeçilmezlerinden olmak istiyor.

title: Sivasspor güç depoluyo
content: Sivasspor , yeni sezon hazırlıklarının ikinci etap çalışmalarını Erzurum 'da yoğun bir şekilde sürdürüyor. Teknik direktör Bülent Uygun yönetiminde gerçekleştirilen antrenmanda futbolcular kuvvet ve taktik çalıştı

title: Southgate istifa etti
content: İngiltere Futbol Federasyonu, teknik direktör Southgate'in görevinden ayrıldığını açıkladı. EURO 2024 finalinde İspanya 'ya 2-1 kaybeden Southgate'li İngiltere, 2018 Dünya Kupası 'nda yarı final, 2022 Dünya Kupası 'nda çeyrek final oynadı. İngilizler, üst üste 2 final kaybetti.

title: Kadıköy'de yıldız yağmuru
content: Transfer sezonunu Levent Mercan ve Çağlar Söyüncü ile açan Fenerbahçe, EURO 2024 sonrasında gaza bastı, açıklamaları peş peşe yaptı. Önce Galatasaray'ın ilgilendiği Oğuz Aydın için harekete geçildi ve kısa süre içinde Alanyaspor 'la anlaşma sağlandı, ardından da 23 yaşındaki oyuncu İstanbul'a geldi. Oğuz'un açıklanmasından saatler sonra ise bir bomba daha patladı. Beşiktaş ileyollarını ayıran milli yıldız Cenk Tosun 'la anlaşma sağlandı. SAĞLIK KONTROLLERİNDEN...

title: TRANSFER HABERLERİ | Beşiktaş'ın istediği Armand Lauriente için Fenerbahçe devrede!
content: Transferin hareketli takımlarından Beşiktaş ile ilgili İtalyan basınından sürpriz bir iddia ortaya atıldı. Haberde Siyah-Beyazlılar'ın daha önce de gündemine gelen Sassuolo forması giyen 25 yaşındaki İtalyan kanat oyuncusu Armand Lauriente 'ye olan ilgisinin sürdüğü belirtildi. EZELİ RAKİP DEVREDE! Takvim'de yer alan baberin detaylarında Beşiktaş'ın bu transfer için Parma , Torino ve ile yarış halinde olduğu belirtilirken Fenerbahçe 'nin de oyuncuyla ilgilendiği belirtildi....

title: Erzurum’da iki imza
content: İç transfer çalışmalarını sürdüren 1. Lig ekiplerinden Erzurumspor , mevcut kadrosunu koruyor. Dadaşlar, sağ açık Süleyman Koç ve kaleci Göktuğ Bakırbaş 'la yeniden anlaştı. Erzurumspor tesislerinde Başkan Ahmet Dal 'ın katılımlarıyla her iki futbolcu ile 1 yıllık resmi sözleşme imzalandı.

title: Sadece bir maç!
content: Düsseldorf 'a 5-2 mağlup olan Galatasaray 'da Okan Buruk oyuncularla konuştu. Özelliklerle genç isimlerle görüşen Buruk, "Sadece hazırlık maçı oynadık. Sonucun bir önemi yok. Sezon öncesi bu skorların ortaya çıkması doğal. Önümüze bakacağız" dedi.

title: Coman reddetti
content: Alman Sky Sport , Fenerbahçe 'nin Bayern Münih tarafından satış listesine koyulan Kingsley Coman 'a transfer teklifinde bulunduğunu ancak Fransız oyuncunun bunu kabul etmediğini yazdı. Haberde; Fenerbahçe'nin Coman'a Bayern Münih'te aldığından daha fazla maaş önerdiği de belirtildi. Fransız kanat oyuncusu, Münih'ten vergiler dahil senelik 15 milyon euro kazanıyor.

title: Son aday Jelert
content: Galatasaray 'da sağ bek transferinde sıcak saatler yaşanıyor. Doue , Bissaka ve Mazraoui gibi isimlerden sonuç alamayan sarı-kırmızılılar, rotayı bu kez Danimarka 'ya kırdı. Hedefte ise Kopenhag 'dan Elias Jelert var. Gizli bir transfer operasyonu yürüten Aslan , 21 yaşındaki oyuncuya 6.5 milyon euro'luk ilk teklifini sundu. Danimarkalı sağ bekin kulübü ise 10 milyon euro bonservis bedeli istediğini iletti. DUYURU YAPACAK Elias Jelert için teklif geldiğini doğrulayan Kopenhag...

title: Çok yönlü transferler
content: Karadeniz devi transfer sezonuna hızlı başlayarak 6 takviye yaptı. Nokta atışı isimler almak isteyen bordo-mavililer; Anthony Nwakaeme , Ozan Tufan , Denis Draguş, Borna Barisic , John Lundstram ve Cihan Çanak 'ı renklerine kattı. Söz konusu isimlerin hepsinin farklı mevkilerde de görev yapabilmeleri dikkat çekti. Abdullah Avcı , yeni transferin çok yönlü olmasına dikkat ediyor. Nwakaeme sol kanat ve forvette, Draguş sol kanat, forvet ve 10 numarada, Ozan Tufan 10 numara, orta saha...

title: Duayenler meclisi
content: Bugün ne Nazım'ın şiirlerinden ne de Abidin'in resimlerinden bahsetmeyeceğim. Uhud Savaşı'na da girmeyeceğim. Akşam Atv ekranlarında büyük üstat Oktay Kaynarca'nın sunduğu yarışma programı Alan'ı izledim. Elenen yarışmacıların miras bırakıp gitmelerini ve programa sempatik bir şekilde veda etmelerini hayranlıkla takip ettim. Namıdiğer Çakır'ın, Hızır Reis'in hafızalara kazınmış racon kesmelerinden sonra; Alan'da yarışmacısına ve seyirciye usta dokunuşunu imrenerek seyrettim. O...

title: Güle güle Lahtimi
content: Yönetim, yabancı kontenjanını düşürmek için harekete geçti. Lahtimi'nin menajeri, sözleşmesinin feshedilmesi için Trabzon 'a çağrılmıştı. Bir yıllık daha sözleşmesi olan 23 yaşındaki Faslı sağ kanadın anlaşması bedelsiz feshedildi.

title: Lundstram lider oyuncu
content: Yeni transfer Lundstram, idmanlardaki performansıyla şimdiden dikkat çekmeyi başardı. Hamsik ve Bakasetas'ın ayrılığı sonrası bir lider oyuncu eksikliği yaşayan Fırtına 'da İngiliz orta sahanın transferiyle bu eksikliğin giderileceği görüşü hakim oldu. Güçlü, kuvvetli ve yıldırıcı bir tarzın yanı sıra sahiplenme, aidiyet ve skor olarak geriye düştüğünde takım arkadaşlarını ayağa kaldıracak bir karaktere sahip olan 30 yaşındaki futbolcunun tam bir komutan görevi...

title: Shakhtar maçı bugün
content: Slovenya 'nın Maribor kentinde kamp yapan Beşiktaş , bugün hazırlık maçında Ukrayna temsilcisi Shakhtar Donetsk ile karşılaşacak. Sports Park Radomlje 'de oynanacak müsabaka TSİ 18.30'da başlayacak. Beşiktaş'ın geçen hafta Hırvatistan ekibi Dinamo Zagreb ile oynamayı planladığı hazırlık maçı yoğun yağış nedeniyle iptal edilmişti. Yeni sezon hazırlıkları kapsamında şu ana kadar bir hazırlık maçı yapabilen siyah-beyazlılar, İstanbul etabında da Ümraniyespor 'la...

title: TRANSFER HABERLERİ | Beşiktaş'tan Emirhan Topçu hamlesi
content: Beşıktaş 'ta transfer çalışmaları devam ederken önemli bir isim daha gündeme geldi. Savunmada yerli rotasyonunu güçlendirmek isteyen siyah beyazlılar, Çaykur Rizespor forması giyen Emirhan Topçu için çalışmalarını sıklaştırdı. 23 yaşındaki stoperi kadrosuna katmak isteyen Beşiktaş , Çaykur Rize ile görüşmeleri ilerletti. Genç futbolcu da Beşiktaş'ta forma giymeye sıcak bakıyor SOL STOPER Sol stoper ve sol bek mevkiilerinde forma giyebilen Emirhan Topçu, Çaykur Rizespor...

title: Defansa joker
content: Trendyol Süper Lig 'in yeni ekiplerinden Göztepe , dört koldan transfer çalışmalarını sürdürüyor. Bulgar Teknik Direktörü Stanimir Stoilov 'un raporu doğrultusunda belirlediği isimlerle görüşmelerde bulunan sarı-kırmızılı kurmaylar, savunma için rotasını Belçika 'ya çevirdi. Göz-Göz, Zulte Waregem 'den Novatus Miroshi 'yi gündemine aldı ve transferde önemli bir mesafe kat etti. Oyuncunun kısa süre içerisinde İzmir 'e gelip resmi sözleşmeyi imzalayacağı öğrenildi....

title: İtalya’nın gözü İmmobile’de
content: Avrupa 'nın en çok dikkat çeken transferlerinden olan Ciro İmmobile , ülkesi İtalya 'da da ilgiyle izleniyor. İmmobile'nin Beşiktaş 'ta karşılanması, taraftarlar tarafından destek görmesi ve kariyerinde yeni bir sayfa açması olumlu karşılandı. EURO 2024 'te istenen performansı gösteremeyen İtalya Milli Takımı , 2026 Dünya Kupası yolunda güçlü bir forvete ihtiyaç duyuyor. İmmobile'nin de Beşiktaş'ta başarılı olması halinde İtalya'nın hücum gücüne katılabileceği...

title: Rakip Fehervar
content: Trendyol Süper Lig 'in yeni ekiplerinden Göztepe , yeni sezon hazırlıklarını Slovenya 'da sürdürmeye devam ediyor. Antrenmanların yanı sıra hazırlık maçlarına da çıkan Göztepe, bugün Macaristan takımı Fehervar FC ile karşı karşıya gelecek. Karşılaşmanın TSİ 11.30'da başlaması bekleniyor.

title: Sıra Trencin’de
content: Lask Linz (3-2) ve Düsseldorf 'a (5-2) kaybeden Galatasaray , yarın Slovakya ekibi Trencin 'le karşılaşacak. Ardından ilk etap kamp çalışmaları bitecek. 3 gün izin yapacak oyuncular, 22-27 Temmuz'da yine Avusturya 'nın Irdning bölgesinde toplanacak.

title: Faruk Ilgaz unutulmadı
content: Fenerbahçe eski başkanlarından Faruk Ilgaz 'ı unutmadı ve vefatının 10'uncu yılında sosyal medya hesabından şu mesajı paylaştı: "Görev süresi boyunca önemli başarılara imza atmış efsane başkanlarımızdan Faruk Ilgaz'ı vefatının 10. yılında saygı ve rahmetle anıyoruz."

title: Mbappe Real'de
content: İspanyol devi Real Madrid , PSG 'yle sözleşmesi sonra eren Fransız yıldız Kylian Mbappe ile 5 yıllık sözleşme imzaladı. Yeni sezonda 9 numaralı formayı giyecek olan Fransız yıldız hücumcu, müze turunun ardından Santiago Bernabeu 'da kendisini görmek için stadı dolduran taraftarları selamladı. 25 yaşındaki forvet, 85 bin taraftarın önünde resmen Real Madrid futbolcusu oldu. İDOLÜNÜ KOPYALADI İdolü olan Cristiano Ronaldo gibi Real'de 9 numarayı seçen, formadaki armayı öpen...

title: Filede kuralar çekildi
content: Voleybolda Türkiye'yi CEV Şampiyonlar Ligi 'nde temsil edecek Türk takımlarının rakipleri belirlendi. Kadınlarda Eczacıbaşı Dynavit B , VakıfBank C, Fenerbahçe Medicana da D Grubu'nda yer aldı. Erkeklerde ise Fenerbahçe Medicana B , Halkbank da D Grubu'nda mücadele edecek.

title: TRANSFER HABERLERİ | Fenerbahçe'ye Joao Felix'ten üzen haber!
content: İspanyol basını, teknik direktör Jose Mourinho 'nun kadrosunda görmek istediği Joao Felix için görüşme yapıldığını ancak Atletico Madrid 'in istediği bonservis miktarının Fenerbahçe 'ye çok geldiğini duyurdu. Haberde; "Fenerbahçe'nin istenilen bonservis bedelini ödemesi imkansız" denildi.

title: Ferdi 40 milyon euro
content: E URO 2024'te değerine değer katan Ferdi Kadıoğlu 'nun talipleri her geçen gün artıyor... Arsenal , Newcastle United , Brighton , Atletico Madrid , Manchester United ve Juventus 'un ardından şimdi de Sevilla , 24 yaşındaki sol bek için harekete geçti. İspanyol basını, Endülüs ekibinin sarı-lacivertlilere 27 milyon euro bonservis önerdiğini ancak Fenerbahçe yönetiminin bu teklifi hiç düşünmeden reddettiğini yazdı. FAVORİ M.UNITED İtalyan medyası ise Juventus'un Ferdi...

title: Biyonik adam Edin Vişça
content: Fırtına'nın deneyimli yıldızı Edin Visça , Macaristan kampında yine en çok konuşulan isimlerin başında yer aldı. Uğurcan'ın yokluğunda kaptanlık görevi üstlenen Boşnak futbolcu tecrübesiyle ve bitmeyen enerjisiyle dikkat çekti. İdman kaçırmayan ve bütün programlara ilk önce gelen 34 yaşındaki yıldız, takım içindeki saygısını katladı. Genç oyuncular da Vişça'nın her adımını takip ediyor.

title: Meunier Lille ile anlaştı
content: Uzun zamandır gündemi meşgul eden Thomas Meunier'in takımdan ayrılışı kesinlik kazandı. Geçtiğimiz sezonun devre arasında Dortmund'dan bedelsiz olarak kadrosuna kattığı Belçikalı sağ bek ile 1.5 yıllık sözleşme imzalamıştı. Ancak tecrübeli futbolcunun sözleşmesinde 15 Temmuz tarihine kadar Avrupa kupalarında oynayan bir takımdan teklif getirmesi durumunda serbest kalır maddesi yer alıyordu. Ailesinin Trabzon 'a gelmek istemediğini gerekçe gösteren Meunier, dün gece saat...

title: Indore shocker: Gunman shoots at cashier, loots Rs 6.6 lakh from bank
content: INDORE : A masked gunman wearing a raincoat barged into a public sector bank in Scheme No. 54, fired a shot at the female cashier, shattering the plexiglass, and made off with over Rs 6.6 lakh on Tuesday afternoon. The robber seems to have recced the bank and his getaway route as the robbery took less than four minutes and he used narrow lanes and bylanes to speed away on a motorcycle. The brazen dacoity has shocked the city, more so since the bank is in a busy street in a residential area....

title: Kozlowski sürprizi
content: İngiliz ekibi Brighton 'ın 2.5 yıl önce 11 milyon euro'ya aldığı Polonyalı orta saha Kozlowski 'ye Gaziantep FK yolunda. İtalyan gazeteci Romano'nun haberine göre; kırmızı-siyahlılarla İngilizler arasında anlaşmaya varılmak üzere. 20 yaşındaki genç maestro, geçen sezon kiralık oynadığı Hollanda ekibi Vitesse 'de 33 maçta 3 gol, 5 asist yaptı.

title: Kartal yüksekten uçar!
content: Güçlü bir hücum hattı oluşturan Beşiktaş'ta yıldızlar dikkat çekiyor. Dünyaca ünlü oyuncular Rafa Silva ve Ciro İmmobile'nin takıma katılması taraftarlarını ayağa kaldıran siyah beyazlı, mevcut kadroda yer alan genç futbolcularıyla da öne çıkıyor. Semih Kılıçsoy ve Ernest Muçi gibi gelecek vaat eden isimlere sahip Kartal, şimdiden yeni sezon öncesi en merak edilen takım olarak göze çarpıyor. Özellikle Rafa Silva-İmmobile ikilisi en merak edilen yıldızlar olarak...

title: Roma bir günde inşa edilmedi
content: Galatasaray 'ın Fildişi Sahilli yıldızı Wilfried Zaha , dikkat çeken açıklamalar yaptı. Ajans 1095'e konuşan 31 yaşındaki oyuncu, bu sezon da takımda kalacağını belirtti. Zaha, "Kendimi şu an buraya vermiş durumdayım. Her zaman söylentiler olacaktır. Bir sonraki sezonun başlamasını sabırsızlıkla bekliyorum" dedi. Takıma uyum süreciyle ilgili de konuşan oyuncu, şunları söyledi: " Palace 'da çok yorucu bir dönem yaşamıştım, sakatlandıktan sonra çok acele ettim. Burada yüksek...

title: Transferi sabırsızlıkla bekleniyordu! Galatasaray'a Wendel müjdesi
content: Yeni sezon hazırlıklarını sürdüren Galatasaray'da transfer çalışmaları sürüyor.

title: Zagadou sesleri
content: Kartal 'da stoper hattına takviye arayışı sürüyor. Yerli ve yabancı birçok adayı listesinde bulunduran siyah beyazlıar, Stuttgart 'ın Fransız stoperi Dan-Axel Zagadou 'yu da takip ediyor. Sol stoperde oynayan 25 yaşındaki futbolcunun, Alman kulübü Stuttgart ile 2026'ya kadar sözleşmesi bulunuyor.

title: Венгрия скрестила пальцы за победу Трампа, заявил Сийярто
content: ООН, 17 июл - ПРАЙМ. title: Latest News | Another Batch of Pilgrims Leaves for Amarnath Yatra
content: Jammu, Jul 17 (PTI) A fresh batch of 3,700 pilgrims left for the Amarnath cave shrine in South Kashmir Himalayas on Wednesday amidst tight security measures. The 20th batch of pilgrims left at 3:05 am in 127 vehicles under CRPF escort from Bhagwati Nagar base camp. The group included 2,734 men, 952 women and nine children. Of these, 2,305 pilgrims opted for the traditional 48-km Pahalgam route, while 1,435 chose the shorter but steeper 14-km Baltal route, they said. The 52-day yatra, which...

title: Британские ученые выяснили, что когнитивные способности "сов" выше
content: Они изучили результаты 26 тыс. человек, проходивших тесты на интеллект, способность к рассуждению, время реакции и память, после чего сравнили результаты со средней продолжительностью сна участников, его качеством и хронотипом (временем, когда мы чувствуем себя наиболее бодрыми и продуктивными). title: 以衝浪經驗比喻AI風險 蕭美琴:政府做大家往前衝的後盾
content: 副總統蕭美琴表示,在AI產業路上,政府做大家往前衝的後盾。(記者王憶紅攝) 〔記者王憶紅/台北報導〕副總統蕭美琴今日出席「2024創新論壇-智慧驅動點亮永續之島」中指出,疫後全球面對很多新的挑戰、衝擊,但台灣產業政策走在對的路上,尤其是AI產業,台灣在全球扮演關鍵性角色,雖然在AI浪潮上,未來也有不可知的風險,但政府會做大家往前衝的後盾。 蕭美琴表示,疫情後,國際政經局勢的變化非常快速,不管是烏俄戰爭、全球性通膨、近日美國政治的戲劇性的變化等等,讓全球的經濟都不斷面臨挑戰、變化,台灣在全球扮演供應鏈、整體安全關鍵角色,也受到新的衝擊,但幸運的是,我們的政策走在對的路上。 請繼續往下閱讀... 蕭美琴說,相對其他先進國家,這幾年我們的經濟表現是穩定,也受到更多國家的重視,前一陣子,全球的AI產業龍頭齊聚在臺灣,更展現了臺灣跟世界接軌,以及臺灣在全球科技供應鏈上,所扮演及發揮的關鍵角色。...

title: DSE2024|英皇書院超級狀元 冀留港升讀醫科懸壺濟世
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 中學文憑試(DSE)今日放榜,誕生10名狀元,其中8名狀元為考獲8科5**的超級狀元。英皇書院葉劭源成為其中一位「超級狀元」,分別在中英文、數學、生物、化學、物理及M2取得7科5星星的優越成績。 葉劭源坦言成績超乎意料,為自己感到驕傲。他表示未有外地升學的打算,更想留在香港就讀醫科,沒有偏好個別院校,待與父母商討後再選校,將來希望成為一位醫生救急扶危,回饋社會。 記者 梁佩施 相關新聞: DSE放榜2024—一文睇清今屆八間「狀元搖籃」 10名尖子身份陸續曝光! title: 北市聯醫仁愛院區照服員疑院內吸毒 警揪出識別證卡套藏K毒
content: 37歲的鄭姓長照照服員(右),因常常工作時恍神,被院內護理長懷疑吸毒。(記者鄭景議翻攝) 〔記者鄭景議/台北報導〕北市聯醫仁愛院區一名37歲的鄭姓長照照服員,因常常工作時恍神,被院內護理長懷疑吸毒,昨日通報大安分局警方,警方到場發現照服員的員工識別證卡套內,藏有一包1.1公克K他命,於是將鄭男依毒品罪嫌帶回偵辦。 據了解,鄭男擔任照顧長照病患的照服員工作,日前就不時出現在院內工作時恍神現象,護理長發現後,覺得鄭男形跡可疑,質問鄭男是否吸毒,儘管鄭男否認,但護理長還是發現鄭男鼻子周遭常有白色不明粉末,於是報警處理。 警方到場後,鄭男仍然不斷否認,表示沒有施用毒品,但院方人員表示他應該今日才施用過,現在只是把鼻子附近的粉末擦去,警方在細心檢查下,果然發現鄭男藏有一包1.1公克K他命。 大安分局也呼籲,為杜絕醫院犯罪行為,警局與轄內醫療院所均有建立安全通報網,嚴格加強安全防護,維護民眾看診權益。 警方到場發現照服員的員工識別證卡套內,藏有一包1.1公克k他命,於是將鄭男依毒品罪嫌帶回偵辦。 (記者鄭景議翻攝) 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: 相隔24年《夏日的麼麼茶》男女主角重逢!鄭秀文虧爆任賢齊
content: 鄭秀文(右)開唱,任賢齊前往欣賞捧場。(翻攝自IG) 〔記者陳慧玲/台北報導〕香港天后「Sammi」鄭秀文近期正在紅館開唱,除了前幾天老公許志安現身當嘉賓嗨翻全場,24年前曾和她一起演出電影《夏日的麼麼茶》男主角任賢齊也來了,雖是坐在台下觀賞,但鄭秀文和他台上、台下合唱主題曲,再次掀起高潮。 任賢齊在社群分享他去觀看鄭秀文演唱會的花絮影片,鄭秀文跟歌迷說要找回集體回憶,談到20多年前曾拍過《夏日的麼麼茶》,現在男主角任賢齊來現場了,任賢齊則對著台上的鄭秀文獻飛吻,全場歡呼尖叫。 請繼續往下閱讀... 任賢齊唱電影主題曲還改歌詞說鄭秀文會愛上他。(翻攝自IG) 看到任賢齊的裝扮,鄭秀文虧他「好風騷」,穿粉紅色T恤,還戴上白框眼鏡,又穿牛仔外套,笑說就像當年他在電影裡的「麼麼茶」角色一樣,都沒有變。 聽到任賢齊講粵語,鄭秀文虧他說的粵語沒有進步,之後任賢齊和她合唱《浪花一朵朵》,任賢齊改歌詞唱到「Sammi你一定會愛上我」,唱完鄭秀文又虧任賢齊,唱到「浪花」歌詞好像唱成「老花」,逗笑全場歌迷。 鄭秀文在台上也一起合唱《浪花一朵朵》。(翻攝自IG)...

title: 电影《美版喋血双雄》正式预告
content: Zee,一个神秘而臭名昭著的刺客,在巴黎黑社会中被称为「死亡女皇」,令人闻风丧胆。在她的神秘导师兼经纪人Finn派遣的任务中,Zee拒绝在巴黎一家夜总会杀死失明的年轻女子Jenn。这使得她和Finn反目,同时也引起精明的警探Sy的注意,并使她陷入一场与自己的过去发生冲突的邪恶犯罪阴谋。电影《美版喋血双雄(The Killer)》由娜塔莉·伊曼纽尔、奥玛·希、萨姆·沃辛顿等人出演,吴宇森执导,预计8月23日上线流媒体平台Peacock。

title: മാപ്പ് നൽകൂ മഹാമതേ! പ്രശസ്ത എഴുത്തുകാരന്റെ വീട്ടിൽ നിന്ന് മോഷ്ടിച്ചതെല്ലാം കള്ളന്‍ തിരികെ എത്തിച്ചു

title: 《弗兰克·斯通的阴影》「Murder Mill」预告
content: 弗兰克·斯通的阴影笼罩着雪松山,他的暴力过去永远地改变了这个小镇。正如一群年轻的朋友即将发现的那样,与即将发生的事情相比,斯通令人不寒而栗的过去就显得微不足道了......《弗兰克·斯通的阴影(The Casting of Frank Stone)》是一款背景设定在《黎明杀机》世界中的互动式电影游戏,由《直到黎明》《黑相集》等游戏的开发商Supermassive Games制作,将于9月3日登陆PS5、Xbox Series及PC平台。

title: Webcam monitors hundreds of rattlesnakes at a Colorado ’mega den’
creator: Associated Press
content: FORT COLLINS, Colo. — They creep, slither and slide over and around each other by the dozen and now there’s a webcam so that anybody can watch them online at any time, even at night. A “mega den” with as many as 2,000 rattlesnakes isn’t top binge-watching for many people. But it’s a viewing bonanza for scientists and other snake enthusiasts whose observations are helping to broaden understanding of these unusual — and undeservedly maligned — reptiles. The remote site on private land in northern...

title: பட்ஜெட்டுக்கு முன் அல்வா கிண்டுவது ஏன் தெரியுமா?

title: सड़क हादसे में दो भाइयों की मौत..घटनास्थल पर मिला हथियार-कारतूस:लूना और पिकअप की आमने-सामने हुई टक्कर, हादसे में दो मवेशियों की भी गई जान
content: नालंदा में लूना और मवेशियों से लदे पिकअप में टक्कर हो गई। हादसे में 2 किशोर की मौत हुई है। दोनों आपस में ममेर-फुफेरे भाई लगते हैं। दुर्घटना के बाद पिकअप गड्ढे में पलट गया था। जिस कारण 2 मवेशियों की भी जान गई है। मौके पर पहुंची पुलिस ने घटनास्थल से का बताया जा रहा कि मृतक फूफा के घर प्रसाद खाने आया था। वापस अपने भाइयों के साथ लूना से घर लौट रहा था। रास्ते में पिकअप से टक्कर हो गई। एक की मौके पर ही मौत हो गई। जबकि एक ने इलाज के दौरान दम तोड़ा है। घटना घटना बिन्द थाना क्षेत्र के बिहटा-सरमेरा...

content: Tirumala News: టీటీడీ(TTD) ప్రక్షాళన దిశగా కూటమి ప్రభుత్వం అడుగులు వేస్తోంది. గత ప్రభుత్వ హయాంలో తిరుమల(Tirumala) ఆలయ ప్రతిష్ఠ మంటగలిపారని భావిస్తున్న రాష్ట్ర ప్రభుత్వం పూర్తిస్థాయిలో అధికారులను మార్చివేస్తోంది. ఇప్పటికే ఈవో(E.O)గా శ్యామలారావును నియమించగా..ఇప్పుడు జేఈవో(J.E.O)గా వెంకయ్య చౌదరిని నియమించింది. తిరుమల ప్రక్షాళన తిరుమల తిరుపతి దేవస్థానములను పూర్తిస్థాయిలో ప్రక్షాళన చేసే దిశగా సీఎం చంద్రబాబు(Chandra Babu) నడుంబిగించారు. వైసీపీ(YCP) పాలనలో అవినీతి, అక్రమాలకు కేంద్రంగా టిటీడీని...

title: 立院決議邀總統國情報告 柯建銘:違憲不算數 不理就好
content: 立法院 本屆第一會期昨天結束,針對國民黨跟民眾黨聯手通過要求解除組團赴中國觀光限制、邀請總統賴清德赴立法院國情報告等決議,民進黨立法院黨團總召 柯建銘 今天表示, 藍白 天天選擇撞牆,這是自殺行為,從來沒看過這麼蠢的政黨。對於藍白昨天通過的決議,柯建銘說,違反憲法的決議統統不算數,不理會就好,不需要提覆議或釋憲。 柯建銘今天接受廣播節目「新聞放鞭炮」專訪表示,選後到現在半年,新的民意、新的國會三黨不過半,結果藍白聯手通過國會擴權法案,還天天選擇撞牆,就連大法官要暫時處分,藍白還用盡所有方式衝撞大法官,這半年立法院給國人的印象,一定是毀憲亂政、衝突有史以來最大的時刻。 「從來沒有看過這麼愚蠢的政黨,急著把自己送到斷頭台。」柯建銘指出,這會期可以看到藍白聯合在衝撞憲法,民進黨則在捍衛憲政體制,當大法官正在釋憲、暫時處分時,藍白直到昨天本會期最後一天,還是通過總統赴立法院國情報告、兩岸開放觀光等案,沒看過這麼愚蠢的政黨,一直在做自殺行為。...

title: Judiciary Workers Paralyse Court Activities in Anambra
creator: David-Chyddy Eleke
content: David-Chyddy Eleke in Awka Courts in Anambra State yesterday remained closed owing to the strike by members of the Judiciary Staff Union of Nigeria (JUSUN), Anambra State branch. The strike crippled activities in all the courts in the state, leaving premises of judiciary deserted. JUSUN had last weekend declared strike following the expiration of a 21-day ultimatum by the union. title: Ohtani launches three-run homer as NL loses All-Star Game
content: Shohei Ohtani launched a three-run homer but it wasn't enough to secure a rare win for the National League in the MLB All-Star Game on Tuesday. content: Nakkaş Mahallesi'nde gece saatlerinde gerçekleşen bir trafik kontrolünde, emniyet güçleri 68 ABZ 709 plakalı bir otomobili durdurdu. title: 夜訪飛鼠、貓頭鷹!知本森林遊樂區推出夜遊體驗
content: 知本國家森林遊樂區即日起推出夜遊,除了容易看到的蛙類,還可探訪飛鼠、貓頭鷹。(記者黃明堂攝) 〔記者黃明堂/台東報導〕農業部林業及自然保育署台東分署即日到11月30日,在知本國家森林遊樂區推出檔期長達4個月的夜間體驗遊程,無論自然愛好者,還是想尋找新奇體驗的旅人,都可在夏夜星空下探訪知本森林。 台東分署說,當夜幕降臨,知本國家森林遊樂區彷彿進入了一個神秘的世界,滿布夜空的星辰和月光映照下的森林,散發著迷人的魅力,讓人彷彿置身於童話故事中。 這裡的夜間生態之豐富,令人驚嘆!在導覽老師的帶領下,有機會見證貓頭鷹靜靜滑翔、飛鼠靈巧跳躍,還有那些只有在夜晚才現身的昆蟲和青蛙,更精彩的是,點點星光的螢火蟲在黑暗的小溪邊跳躍,如同一場自然的燈光秀。 夜探知本由台東分署的國家森林志工,以生態體驗、森林療癒、夜間星象等主題串聯,為大家進行生動有趣的導覽解說。全程活動約90分鐘,費用每人350元,包括入園門票、保險、導覽及設備租用等。這樣的安排不僅在安全的環境中盡情探索,還能寓教於樂,增加自然保育知識。...

title: 謝國樑談連署人認定爭議:地方選務獨立運作 依法行政
content: 中央選委會和基隆市選委會對 罷免 連署人,未回覆查詢單是否合格認定不同。基隆市長謝國樑今天說,此事要先確定「地方選務獨立運作、依法行政」,各方意見,中央和地方選委會都會考量。 發動罷免謝國樑人士組成公民團體「山海拆樑行動小組」,8日送交4萬3138名連署人名冊,期待 中選會 宣告罷免案成立。 基市選委會 9日展開查對作業,對於有疑慮的連署人,將寄發查詢單確認真偽。 收到查詢單但未回覆的連署人,基市選委會決議視為不合格連署人,但中選委會主張應視為合格,爭議性最高,公民團體表達異議。 謝國樑今早出席基隆火車站南站公車亭,由星宇航空公司認養啟用儀式時表示,依照公職人員選舉罷免法,地方選務獨立運作、依法行政,他覺得「這個要先把它確定下來」。如果各方有什麼意見,市府都會反映給基市選委會跟中選會,讓他們來做一定的考量。 民進黨基隆市議員鄭文婷舉高雄市長罷免案為例,過去高雄罷韓(時任高雄市長韓國瑜)的時候,也曾經發生過類似狀況,也就是高市選委會跟中選會認定不一致,但中選會終究是上級主管機關,有統一解釋的權限,因此高市選委會最後定調,連署人如果沒有回函的話,不能夠直接剔除。...

title: 足球》美洲盃決賽受傷 梅西至少缺席2場MLS比賽
content: 梅西美洲盃決賽受傷,接下來2場MLS比賽預計都不會上場。(資料照,法新社) 李冠霖/核稿編輯 〔體育中心/綜合報導〕阿根廷本屆美洲盃決賽,在延長賽以1:0扳倒哥倫比亞,不過陣中頭號球星梅西(Lionel Messi)卻在比賽中因傷提前退場,而今消息指出,梅西將缺席母隊邁阿密國際接下來2場比賽。 梅西在美洲 盃 決賽中因為右腳受傷,在下半場第64分鐘提前退場,並被拍到在球員席上掩面啜泣,今天邁阿密國際的總教練馬蒂諾(Gerardo Martino)表示,因為傷勢關係,接下來MLS的比賽,梅西至少要休息2場。 請繼續往下閱讀... 邁阿密國際球團也表示,梅西受傷的地方為右腳腳踝韌帶,至於實際要休養多久,還需要看復原情形而定。 本週邁阿密國際有兩場比賽要踢,分別是對上多倫多FC、以及芝加哥火焰,兩場比賽梅西預計都無法出賽。 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: Преображення Господнє 2024: коли велике свято і що треба встигнути зробити
content: Преображення Господнє 2024 відзначається 6 серпня. Це одне із найбільших християнських свят, яке присвячене духовному відродженню Ісуса Христа. РБК-Україна (проект Styler) розповідає про історію і традиції Преображення Господнього та що треба встигнути до свята. Історія свята Преображення Господнє є важливим християнським святом, яке відзначається у Православній церкві з IV століття. Після переходу на новоюліанський календар, дата свята змістилася з 19 на 6 серпня. Цей день присвячено...

title: Преображение Господне 2024: когда большой праздник и что нужно успеть сделать
content: Преображение Господне 2024 года отмечается 6 августа. Это один из самых больших христианских праздников, посвященный духовному возрождению Иисуса. РБК-Украина (проект Styler) рассказывает об истории и традициях Преображения Господня и что нужно успеть да праздника. История праздника Преображение Господне является важным христианским праздником, отмечаемым в Православной церкви с IV века. После перехода на новый юлианский календарь, дата праздника сместилась с 19 на 6 августа. Этот день...

title: Boomer Uncle OTT: ఓటీటీలో యోగిబాబు కామెడీ ఎంటర్ టైనర్.. తెలుగులో బూమర్ అంకుల్ స్ట్రీమింగ్.. ఎప్పటినుంచంటే?
creator: Basha Shek
content: కోలీవుడ్ స్టార్ కమెడియన్ యోగిబాబు ఈ మధ్యన హీరోగానూ వరుసగా సినిమాలు చేస్తున్నాడు. ఓవైపు స్టార్ హీరోల సినిమాల్లో కమెడియన్ గా అదరగొడుతోన్న ఆయన.. మరోవైపు సోలో హీరోగానూ సత్తా చాటుతున్నాడు. అలా యోగిబాబు హీరోగా నటించిన తాజా చిత్రం ‘బూమర్ అంకుల్’. మార్చి 29న కోలీవుడ్ థియేటర్లలో రిలీజైన ఈ చిత్రం అక్కడి జనాలను బాగానే ఆకట్టుకుంది. ఎప్పటిలాగే యోగిబాబు తన దైన కామెడీ స్టైల్ తో ఆడియెన్స్ ను మెప్పించారు. ఇప్పుడీ బూమర్ అంకుల్ మూవీ తెలుగులో ఓటీటీలోకి రానుంది. ప్రముఖ తెలుగు ఓటీటీ ప్లాట్ ఫామ్ ఆహా ఈ సినిమా...

title: Dominique Rousseau : « Si le pays s’enlise dans le blocage, ce ne sera pas la faute des institutions, mais celle de nos responsables politiques »
content: Dominique Rousseau est professeur émérite de droit public à l’université Paris-I Panthéon-Sorbonne et membre honoraire de l’Institut universitaire de France. Spécialiste de droit constitutionnel, il a notamment écrit l’ouvrage Les Contestations. Penser, décider, agir (Belopolie, 56 pages, 10 euros). D’après la Constitution, en l’absence d’une majorité absolue au Parlement, le président n’est pas tenu de nommer un premier ministre issu d’un camp particulier. Et justement, nous sommes...

title: ரேஷன் கடைகளில் உயரும் பருப்பு, பாமாயில் விலை? தமிழக அரசு எடுக்கப்போகும் அதிரடி முடிவு: காரணம் என்ன?
creator: திருச்சி தீபன்
content: தமிழகத்தில் எழை, எளிய மக்கள் அன்றாடம் பயன்படுத்தும் உணவு பொருட்களை மலிவான விலையில் தரமாக வழங்க வேண்டும். ஆகையால் தமிழ்நாடு அரசு ரேஷன் கடைகள் மூலமாக மக்களுக்கு உணவுக்கு தேவையான பொருட்களை வழங்கி வருகிறது. குறிப்பாக தமிழகத்தில் சுமார் 2 கோடியே 21 லட்சம் குடும்ப அட்டை தாரர்கள் இருக்கிறார்கள். இதில் 1 கோடியே 90 லட்சம் குடும்ப அட்டைதாரர்கள் மாதம் தோறும் ரேஷன் கடைகளில் துவரம் பருப்பு, சமையல் எண்ணெயை (பாமாயில்) மிக குறைந்த விலையில் பெற்று வருகிறார்கள். குறிப்பாக தமிழகத்தில் சிறப்பு வினியோகத்...

content: Kathy Willens, pathbreaking Associated Press photographer who captured sports and more, dies at 74 NEW YORK (AP) — A pathbreaking photojournalist who helped cement women’s place behind the lens during her nearly 45-years career at The Associated Press has died. Willens was among The AP’s first female staff photographers, joining the news...

title: ライトに気を取られた...車とバイクが衝突 男性死亡(九州朝日放送)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 7/17(水) 12:45 配信 九州朝日放送 17日朝早く、福岡県久留米市の国道で軽乗用車とバイクが衝突する事故がありバイクに乗っていた男性が搬送先の病院で死亡しました。17日午前5時すぎ、久留米市田主丸町の国道で、23歳の男性が運転する軽乗用車が右折しようとしたところ、対向車線を直進してきたバイクと衝突しました。この事故で、バイクに乗っていた男性が全身を強く打ち、病院に搬送されましたが、間もなく死亡が確認されました。現場は片側1車線の直線道路で、軽乗用車は道路沿いのコンビニエンスストアに入ろうとして事故を起こしたとみられています。運転していた男性は「バイクの後ろを走っていた車のライトに気を取られた」などとと話しているということです。死亡した男性は50代と見られ、警察は身元の確認を進めるとともに、当時の状況を詳しく調べています。...

title: Ni Jabugo ni Galaroza, este es el pueblo de la sierra de Huelva más reconocido por su riqueza gastronómica
content: La gastronomía es una cuestión básica a la hora de planificar un viaje . Si a una cocina espectacular se le suma, además, la sierra y su fresco, naturaleza y buenos ingredientes, la escapada estos días sabe el doble de bien. Jamón, carne, verduras de la tierra... los onubenses pueden presumir de un mix casi perfecto. En eso la sierra de Huelva sabe lo que hace. title: Episodio de calor extremo a Sevilla: esto cuesta poner el aire acondicionado por hora y toda la noche
content: El calor en Sevilla no va a dar tregua , por lo menos, hasta la semana que viene. Si este miércoles se esperan 37 grados, la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (Aemet) prevé que suba a 39 de máxima este jueves. Peor será el viernes, cuando los servicios meteorológicos estiman que Sevilla puede pasar de los 40 grados en las horas centrales del día. El fin de semana seguirá en la misma línea, rondando los 40. Ya de cara al lunes se espera una ligera mejoría. El calor bajará a los 36...

Así lo estima Funcas, el centro de análisis de las cajas de ahorro, en su último informe de previsiones sobre las economías regionales. Según el estudio anterior, en 2023 había todavía siete territorios que se habían quedado por debajo de los niveles de 2019: Cataluña, Extremadura, Castilla y León, Cantabria, Asturias, Baleares y Canarias. content: लंडन : इंग्लिश फुटबॉल संघाचे मुख्य प्रशिक्षक गेराथ साऊथगेट यांनी युरो स्पर्धेत अंतिम सामन्यात आलेल्या अपयशानंतर आपल्या पदाचा राजीनामा दिला आहे. गेली आठ वर्षे त्यांनी ही जबाबदारी सांभाळली होती. त्यांच्या मार्गदर्शनाखाली इंग्लंड संघाने युरो स्पर्धेत अंतिम फेरी गाठली; मात्र रविवारी झालेल्या अंतिम सामन्यात स्पेनने २-१ असा विजय मिळवला आणि इंग्लंड संघाचे स्वप्न धुळीस मिळाले. इंग्लिशमन असल्याचा मला अभिमान आहे. इंग्लंड संघाचा खेळाडू आणि त्यानंतर प्रशिक्षक राहण्याचा सन्मान मला मिळाले, हे माझे भाग्य आहे....

title: Navy Personnel, Seven Others Abducted in Akwa Ibom State
creator: Okon Bassey
content: Okon Bassey in Uyo A naval rating and seven other persons have reportedly been kidnapped in Akwa Ibom State. This is coming few days after a bus driver and 18 passengers leaving Uyo to Port Harcourt, Rivers state were abducted and their whereabouts still unknown. The latest kidnapping of the naval rating and others was said to have occurred in Ibaka, Mbo Local Government Area of the state. The victims were abducted Monday night at Classic Point Hotel, Ibaka by the gunmen to an unknown...

title: 'കർക്കിടകമല്ലേ, ഒന്ന് മുങ്ങിക്കുളിക്കാമെന്ന് വെച്ചു; നായ വന്നപ്പോൾ ആട്ടിയതോടെ തോട്ടിലേക്ക് വീണു'; ചന്ദ്രമതി
content: പാലക്കാട്: തോട്ടിലേക്ക് കുളിയ്ക്കാനായി പോയപ്പോൾ നായ വന്നെന്നും അതിനെ ആട്ടിവിടാൻ ശ്രമിച്ചതോടെ കാൽവഴുതി വീഴുകയായിരുന്നുവെന്നും 78കാരിയായ ചന്ദ്രമതി. ചെറുപ്പം മുതലേ നീന്തലറിയാമായിരുന്നു. മരത്തിൽ തൂങ്ങിപ്പിടിച്ചപ്പോൾ വീട്ടിലേക്ക് പോകാൻ കഴിയില്ലെന്ന് കരുതിയെന്നും ചന്ദ്രമതി പറയുന്നു. ഒറ്റപ്പാലം സൗത്ത് പനമണ്ണ പൂക്കാട്ടുകുർശ്ശി ചന്ദ്രമതിയാണ് ഒഴുക്കിൽ നിന്ന് മനക്കരുത്ത് കൊണ്ട് രക്ഷപ്പെട്ടത്. കുളിയ്ക്കാനായി തോട്ടിലിറങ്ങി ഒഴുക്കിൽപെട്ട ചന്ദ്രമതി രക്ഷപ്പെടാനായി മരകൊമ്പിൽ തൂങ്ങി നിന്നത് 10...

title: નર્મદા : ડેડીયાપાડામાં પૂલ તૂટી જવા લોકો જીવન જોખમે નદી પસાર કરવા મજબૂર, જુઓ વીડિયો
creator: TV9 Gujarati
content: સરકાર રસ્તા માટે કરોડો ખર્ચે રસ્તા અને પૂલ બનાવે છે. બીજી તરફ રસ્તા માટે સતત વિવાદો થાય છે અને રસ્તા માટે આંદોલન થાય છે. રસ્તાનો રસ્તો કરવા લોકો રોષ પણ વ્યક્ત કરે છે પરંતુ રાજ્યના રસ્તાઓ ક્યારે સંતોષકારક સ્થિતિમાં આવશે તે સવાલનો જવાબ જડતો નથી. આ વાત કહેવા પાછળનું કારણ નર્મદાના ડેડિયાપાડાનો પુલ છે. અહીં પુલ બે ટુકડામાં તુટી ગયો છે. મોવીથી ડેડિયાપાડાને જોડતો આ પુલ ખાડી પર બનેલો હતો. ભારે વરસાદ પડ્યો અને બ્રિજના બે ટુકડા થઈ ગયા હતા. હવે જુઓ બ્રિજના ટુકડાં થયા પછીની સ્થિતિ બદતર છે. પૂલ તો બંધ થઈ...

title: Erra Matti Dibbalu in Visakhapatnam lie in monumental neglect
creator: Usha Peri
content: VISAKHAPATNAM: With heavy machinery tearing down the sand dunes at one location, a film production unit levelling the sand dunes to construct a film set at another, and real estate plots coming up close to the dunes, the Erra Matti Dibbalu (Red Sand Dunes) in Visakhapatnam are facing escalated threats. content: Laleye Dipo in Minna The Niger State Chapter of the Peoples’ Democratic Party (PDP) has said that it is not moved by the spate of defections of some of its members to the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC). title: Marauding from the mid-range, Nikhat Zareen finds the optimum fighting flair
creator: Shashank Nair, Nitin Sharma
content: At the Paris Olympics, Nikhat Zareen may very well live and die at the mid-range. While most boxers in India prefer to stay on the outside and then move in swiftly, unleash their punches and duck out, India’s best boxer in this Olympic cycle prefers to stay in the eye of the storm. Zareen is simply brave in just where she starts to box. You’ll rarely see her too close to an opponent, or too far away for that matter. She’s always precise in how far away she is from her challenger. Literally an...

title: தமிழ்நாட்டில் இன்று மிக கனமழைக்கு வாய்ப்பு: ஆரஞ்சு எச்சரிக்கை விடுத்த இந்திய வானிலை ஆய்வு மையம்
creator: தினத்தந்தி
content: புதுடெல்லி, தமிழகத்தில் தென்மேற்கு பருவமழை தீவிரமடைந்துள்ளது. தமிழகத்தின் அநேக இடங்களில் (உள் மாவட்டங்களில் அநேக இடங்களிலும், கடலோர மாவட்டங்களில் ஒருசில இடங்களிலும்) மழை பெய்துள்ளது. புதுவை மற்றும் காரைக்கால் பகுதிகளிலும் மிக லேசான மழை பதிவாகியுள்ளது. நேற்று மத்தியமேற்கு வங்கக்கடல் பகுதிகளில் நிலவிய காற்றழுத்த தாழ்வு பகுதி இன்று தெற்கு சத்தீஸ்கர் மற்றும் அதனை ஒட்டிய விதர்பா நில பகுதிகளில் நிலவுகிறது. ஒரு புதிய காற்றழுத்த தாழ்வு பகுதி மத்தியமேற்கு மற்றும் அதனை ஒட்டிய வடமேற்கு வங்கக்கடல்...

title: 'രണ്ട് ചെറിയ കുട്ടികളുടെ അമ്മയല്ലേ..'; ആനന്ദിന്റെ വിവാഹാഘോഷത്തിനിടെ ഉറക്കംതൂങ്ങി ശ്ലോക
content: മു കേഷ് അംബാനിയുടേയും നിത അംബാനിയുടേയും മരുമകള്‍ ശ്ലോക മെഹ്തയുടെ വീഡിയോ സോഷ്യല്‍ മീഡിയയില്‍ ചര്‍ച്ചയാകുന്നു. ആനന്ദ് അംബാനിയുടേയും രാധിക മെര്‍ച്ചന്റിന്റേയും വിവാഹാഘോഷത്തിനിടെ ഉറക്കംതൂങ്ങുന്ന ശ്ലോകയാണ് വീഡിയോയിലുള്ളത്. വിവാഹത്തിന് ശേഷം ശനിയാഴ്ച്ച നടന്ന ശുഭ് ആശിര്‍വാദ് ചടങ്ങിനിടെയായിരുന്നു സംഭവം. വേദിയുടെ മുന്‍നിരയില്‍ ഭര്‍ത്താവ് ആകാശ് അംബാനിക്കൊപ്പമാണ് ശ്ലോക ഇരിക്കുന്നത്. ഇതിനിടയില്‍ രണ്ട് തവണ ഉറക്കത്തിലേക്ക് വീണ ശ്ലോക ഞെട്ടി കണ്ണ് തുറക്കുന്നതും വീഡിയോയില്‍ കാണാം. ഇതിന് താഴെ അംബാനിയുടെ...

title: Exiled Chinese businessman Guo convicted of fraud
creator: Reuters Videos
content: STORY: Guo Wengui, an exiled Chinese businessman and vocal critic of Beijing, has been convicted in the U.S. of stealing hundreds of millions of dollars from online followers. Jailed since March 2023, Guo's convictions ranged from racketeering conspiracy to wire fraud. His seven-week trial ended Tuesday. Federal prosecutors in Manhattan alleged Guo raised over $1 billion through fraudulent investment and cryptocurrency schemes from 2018 to 2023. Guo reportedly told his followers some of the...

content: Muscat (Oman), July 17 (ANI) An Indian national was among six people killed in an attack on the Ali bin Abi Talib mosque in Muscat the capital city of Oman. title: USA's grim draw ahead of Olympic duel with Matildas
creator: Stephen Whyno
content: The Matildas' looming Olympic opponents, the United States, will enter the Paris Games after a grim scoreless draw with Costa Rica in their final warm-up game. The draw was played in intense heat in Washington and marks the second time the US haven't won their last tune-up for a major tournament. The US, four-time Olympic gold medallists, are grouped with Australia, Germany and Zambia in Paris - they play the Matildas in the final group game. Against Costa Rica, the goals didn't come on Tuesday...

title: Japan’s Nikkei Gives Up Early Gains as Chip-Related Shares Retreat
creator: 新間
content: Reuters 12:44 JST, July 17, 2024 TOKYO (Reuters) – Japan’s Nikkei share average surrendered most of its early gains on Wednesday, as investors sold heavyweight chip-related stocks to book profits. The Nikkei was up 0.08% at 41,307.36 by the midday break, after rising as much as 0.46% earlier in the session on Wall Street’s strong finish overnight. title: Grünen-Fraktionschef: Müssen den Menschen Hoffnung geben
content: BERLIN (dpa-AFX) - Die Grünen sollten den Menschen in Deutschland wieder mehr Hoffnung geben. Das fordert der Fraktionsvorsitzende der Partei im Berliner Abgeordnetenhaus, Werner Graf. "Wir sind eine sehr technische Partei geworden, die Maßnahmen am Rechenschieber für Wissenschaftler erklärt, aber die nicht die Herzen der Menschen erreicht", sagte Graf der Zeitung "Tagesspiegel". title: Sports News | US Women's Soccer Team Fights the Heat, Plays to a Draw Against Costa Rica in Final Olympic Tune-up
content: Washington, Jul 17 (AP) The heat was on for the U.S. women's soccer team's final exhibition tune-up game before the Paris Olympics, with sweltering temperatures in the air and plenty of chances to score. The goals did not come in a 0-0 draw against Costa Rica on Tuesday night, just the second time — and first since 2015 — the U.S. did not win its last game before a major tournament. But the match showed the Americans could handle the kind of high temperatures that could await later this month....

title: ಅಂಕೋಲಾ ಗುಡ್ಡ ಕುಸಿತ ಪ್ರಕರಣ: ಮುಂದುವರೆದ ರಕ್ಷಣಾ ಕಾರ್ಯಾಚರಣೆ, ಮೃತರ ಕುಟುಂಬಕ್ಕೆ ತಲಾ ರೂ.5 ಲಕ್ಷ ಪರಿಹಾರ ಘೋಷಣೆ

content: ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು : 2 ದಿನಗಳಿಂದ ಸುರಿಯುತ್ತಿರುವ ಅವ್ಯಾಹಸ ಮಳೆ ಉತ್ತರ ಕನ್ನಡ ಕರಾವಳಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಭಾರೀ ಅನಾಹುತ, ಅವಘಡಗಳ ಸರಮಾಲೆಯನ್ನೇ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಸಿದೆ. ಹಲವೆಡೆ ಗುಡ್ಡ ಕುಸಿತದಿಂದ 11 ಜನ ಮೃತರಾಗಿರುವ ಶಂಕೆ ವ್ಯಕ್ತವಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಐದು ಮೃತದೇಹ ಪತ್ತೆಯಾಗಿದೆ. ಜಿಲ್ಲೆಯ ಕರಾವಳಿಯ ಪ್ರಮುಖ ರಸ್ತೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲವೂ ಬಂದ್ ಆಗಿದ್ದು, ಅಕ್ಷರಶಃ ದ್ವೀಪದಂತಾಗಿದೆ. ಕರಾವಳಿಯ ಐದೂ ತಾಲೂಕುಗಳ ಬಹುತೇಕ ಭಾಗ ಜಲಾವೃತ್ತವಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಮನೆಯಿಂದ ಹೊರ ಬರದಂತಹ ಸ್ಥಿತಿ ನಿರ್ಮಾಣವಾಗಿದೆ. ಜನರ ಆಕ್ರಮಂದ ಮುಗಿಲು ಮುಟ್ಟಿದ್ದು, ಜನಜೀವನ ಅಸ್ತವ್ಯಸ್ತಗೊಂಡಿದೆ. ಅಂಕೋಲಾ ಬಳಿ ಕುಸಿದ ಗುಡ್ಡದ ಅಡಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಸಿಲುಕಿ ಒಂದೇ ಕುಟುಂಬದ ಐವರು ಹಾಗೂ...

title: ‘Tense, chaotic, and horrific’: eyewitness describes scenes during Oman attack
creator: none@none.com (Monitoring Desk)
content: “THE HALL of the mosque was packed with hundreds of worshippers and the atmosphere was heavy with tension as the sound of panicked, laboured breathing grew louder. The relentless firing of bullets echoed for over an hour, eventually becoming sporadic, but for nearly three hours, death loomed over us.” This is how a Pakistani eyewitness trapped inside the imambargah in Oman’s Al Wadi Al Kabir described their ordeal during the attack that unfolded on Monday night, the Times of Oman reported. title: Đã xác định nghi phạm, nguyên nhân vụ 6 người Việt chết ở Thái Lan
content: Tin mới nhất vụ 6 người Việt chết ở Thái Lan của Khaosod sáng 17.7 cho hay, 1 trong 6 người đã đầu độc 5 người còn lại trong phòng khách sạn hạng sang ở Bangkok. title: 夕方にかけ激しい雨が降る所も...予想最高気温は富山市29度・高岡市伏木28度で暑さ和らぐか(富山テレビ)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 7/17(水) 12:44 配信 富山テレビ放送 梅雨前線の影響で、17日の富山県内は夕方にかけて激しい雨が降る所もありそうです。県内は、温かく湿った空気が流れ込み、朝から広く雨が降っています。上空の大気の状態が不安定で、昼過ぎから夕方にかけては所によって1時間に30ミリの強い雨が降りそうです。気象台は、警報級の大雨となるところがあるとして、土砂災害や浸水などに警戒を呼び掛けています。また、日中の最高気温は16日よりも3度前後低く、富山市は29度、高岡市伏木は28度の予想で暑さは和らぎそうです。18日は高気圧に覆われて広く晴れ、強い日差しが降り注ぐため日中は35度以上の猛暑日になりそうです。*17日午前11時の状況 富山テレビ放送 【続報】ダムに軽乗用車が転落 運転席から女子専門学校生を心肺停止の状態で発見 男性職員は不明のまま...

title: 8만 명 팬 환영 속 레알마드리드 입단...음바페 “어릴 적 꿈 이뤘다”
content: 음바페, 레알 마드리드와 5년 계약 유창한 스페인어로 입단 소감 밝혀 c뉴시스 프랑스 출신의 세계적인 공격수 킬리안 음바페(25)가 8만 여명의 팬들 앞에서 스페인 명문 축구 구단 레알 마드리드 입단을 공식 선언했다. 음바페는 16일(한국시각) 레알의 홈구장인 산티아고 베르나베우에서 열린 입단식에서 “팀의 리그 우승을 위해 모든 것을 바치겠다”며 입단 포부를 밝혔다. 지난 시즌까지 프랑스 프로축구 파리생제르맹(PSG)에서 뛰었던 음바페는...

content: Ngày 17.7, Ban tổ chức Lễ hội Vì hòa bình năm 2024 cho biết để tạo sự hài hòa trong việc bố trí nội dung, không gian, thời gian, địa điểm đảm bảo tốt nhất cho các hoạt động, sự kiện trong khuôn khổ Lễ hội Vì hòa bình 2024; sau khi báo cáo và được sự đồng ý của Ban chỉ đạo kỷ niệm các ngày lễ lớn năm 2024 của tỉnh Quảng Trị, Ban tổ chức Lễ hội Vì hòa bình năm 2024 điều chỉnh thời gian tổ...

title: Over 60 killed In Israeli Strikes Across Gaza Strip, Including 'Safe Zone'
creator: Zee News
content: Airstrikes in recent days have brought a constant drumbeat of deaths of Palestinians in the Gaza Strip, even as Israel has pulled back or scaled down major ground offensives in the north and south. Israeli airstrikes killed more than 60 Palestinians in southern and central Gaza overnight and into Tuesday, including one that struck an Israeli-declared “safe zone” crowded with thousands of displaced people. title: 【高校部活動中】やり投げのやりが生徒の首に刺さる 命に別条なし 陸上競技部練習中にやりが跳ね返ったか助走中に転倒した可能性 岩手・盛岡市(テレビ岩手ニュース)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 7/17(水) 12:44 配信 TVIテレビ岩手 16日夕方、岩手県盛岡市の高校で、やり投げの練習中だった陸上競技部の生徒の首に、やりが刺さる事故がありました。事故があったのは盛岡商業高校の校庭で、16日午後5時半ごろ、やり投げの練習をしていた陸上競技部の2年生の男子生徒ののど元付近に、やり投げのやりの後方部分の先端が刺さり、病院に搬送されました。学校によりますと、生徒に意識はあり、検査の結果、首の筋肉などに損傷はないということです。学校と警察、消防によりますと、地面に向かってやりを投げる練習をしていて、やりが地面から跳ね返ったか、助走中に生徒が転倒した可能性があるということです。当時、顧問は職員室に戻っていました。髙橋克壽校長は「生徒の無事を祈るとともに詳細を確認する」と話しています。...

軍武圖輯》壓制老共山東號航艦氣焰 美F-35B密集起降兩棲登陸艦
content: 「美利堅號」兩棲登陸艦(USS America, LHA-6)近日於菲律賓海海域,進行F-35B戰機的垂直起降與飛行任務,並釋出系列「超近距離」照片!(圖片擷取自第七艦隊臉書) 〔記者劉宇捷/綜合報導〕正當在夏威夷舉行的RIMPAC正如火如荼展開時,美國海軍太平洋艦隊仍於西太平洋照常執行例行演訓;其中,第七艦隊所屬的「美利堅號」兩棲登陸艦(USS America, LHA-6)近日於菲律賓海海域,進行F-35B戰機的垂直起降與飛行任務,並釋出系列「超近距離」照片,而無獨有偶的是,中共山東號航艦近期也在該海域滯留,並 被偵獲有大量艦載機起降活動。 根據美國海軍第七艦隊釋出的照片顯示,有「小航艦」之稱的美利堅號兩棲登陸艦,近日於菲律賓海執行艦載機飛行任務,該艦目前部署了美軍最新銳的F-35B型垂直起降匿蹤戰機,從任務照片可見,由於海面水氣夠重,甚至在光線下可以看到彩虹!此外,從畫面的光線可推斷飛行訓練不分晝夜、可能也不只一場。 請繼續往下閱讀......

title: メインキャストは日系ブラジル人 外国籍が2割の町でつくる短編映画
content: 住民の約2割が の などを舞台にした短編映画「NOVA」が制作中だ。 がテーマで、メインキャストは同町出身、在住の日系 人が務める。 など各映画祭への出品を目指す。劇場での公開は来春以降になる見通しだ。 監督は、「シン・ 」や「ガリレオ」などで助監督を務めた寺田悠真氏。同町に通って に接する中で、人の労働よりもAI( )が優先される可能性がある今後の社会をどう考えるのか、と感じたことが作品化のきっかけだという。 映画には同町出身でモデルの日系ブラジル人3世・西村カロリナさんや、同町在住の北原ジョセ・ルイスさんらが出演。イラストの仕事をAIに奪われた日系ブラジル人の女性と、アジア人労働者の増加で仕事を追われた父親が、衝突をしながらも仕事探しの旅を通じて、新たな生き方を見つけるという内容だ。上映時間は約30分。 町内のハナミズキ通りや町役場で撮影が行われ、町職員もエキストラで登場する。...

title: Trea Turner makes spectacular mic’d-up play at MLB All-Star Game and Bryce Harper loved it
creator: Sean Savage
content: Trea Turner did not let being live on the air stop him from making a spectacular play during the American League’s 5-3 win over the National League at the 2024 MLB All-Star Game on Tuesday night. The Philadelphia Phillies shortstop was mic’d up at Globe Life Field in Arlington, Texas, in the bottom of the second inning, along with All-Star teammates Bryce Harper and Alec Bohm. Vladimir Guerrero Jr. belted a ground ball toward center field with one out and a man on first. Turner swiftly reacted...

Dallas Mavericks point guard Kyrie Irving breaks hand, undergoes surgery
content: Dallas Mavericks point guard Kyrie Irving recently underwent surgery to repair a broken left hand suffered earlier this month while he was training, the club announced on Tuesday. No timetable for the 32-year-old’s return was given, but reported the Mavericks are optimistic Irving will be ready for the start of training camp in a couple of months. The eight-time All-Star teamed with Luka Doncic to key Dallas’ run to the NBA Finals, where the Mavericks lost to the Boston Celtics in five games...

title: Delhi News: दिल्ली में मुहर्रम जुलूस के लिए कड़ी की गई सुरक्षा
creator: Zee News Hindi
content: एडवाइजरी के अनुसार, प्रभावित होने वाले प्रमुख मार्गों और क्षेत्रों में जामा मस्जिद, चावड़ी बाजार, ओखला, कमरा बंगश, महरौली, पुरानी पुलिस चौकी और निजामुद्दीन शामिल हैं. बुधवार दोपहर से रात तक कुछ मार्ग ऐसे है जिन पर सिटी बसों की आवाजाही प्रतिबंधित और विनियमित रहेगी. Delhi News: बुधवार को मुहर्रम के जुलूसों से पहले ही दिल्ली में सुरक्षा व्यवस्था बढ़ा दी गई. अधिकारियों ने कहा कि राष्ट्रीय राजधानी में जुलूसों की सुरक्षा और सुचारू संचालन सुनिश्चित करने के लिए व्यापक इंतजाम किए गए हैं. जामा मस्जिद...

title: Accident victim’s organs save two lives in Odisha
creator: Express News Service
content: CUTTACK/JAGATSINGHPUR: The family of a 58-year-old man, Birendra Prasad Swain, who died following a road accident, has given new hope to two persons by donating his kidneys. Swain, belonging to Redhua in Jagatsinghpur district, met with an accident at Raghunathpur Bazaar on the Cuttack-Paradip state highway on Friday night while returning from a marriage feast. A speeding car struck him, causing severe injuries. He was admitted to SCB Medical College and Hospital, Cuttack in critical condition....

creator: Tribune Online
content: THE faction of the Rivers Assembly loyal to Governor Siminalaye Fubara, has described the move to stop the governor from spending the state’s revenue as unfounded, News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) reported. The speaker of the faction, Mr Victor Oko-Jumbo, said at a sitting of the assembly in Port Harcourt on Tuesday that such a move was illegal and unpopular. title: 슬리피 '학교폭력 당한 적 있어..현재 예방 강사 됐다' 고백 ('라디오쇼')[종합]

title: Broadcasting legend David Morrow dies aged 71
creator: 9News
content: Tweet Facebook Mail Renowned radio sports commentator David Morrow has died months after being diagnosed with brain cancer . He was 71. Morrow, who was affectionately nicknamed "Thirsty", had called rugby league, cricket and other sports for more than 50 years before his retirement in February following his diagnosis. ﻿ "Apart from being a magnificent commentator ﻿he was a really, really good man," colleague and friend of more than 40 years Ray Hadley told 2GB radio this afternoon. title: BMTC staffer ends life at head office
creator: Express News Service
content: BENGALURU: A 42-year-old BMTC employee ended his life by hanging at the BMTC head office located in Shantinagar under the Wilson Garden police limits on Monday night. The deceased has been identified as Mahesh Gulli, a resident of Kengeri and a native of Vijayapura. Police said Mahesh hung himself in the storeroom, using computer wires. title: 焦點股》宏碩系統:出關更猛 股價飆漲停
content: 宏碩系統出關,今股價飆漲停(記者洪友芳攝) 〔記者洪友芳/新竹報導〕高功率真空微波管廠商宏碩系統(6895)股票處置期昨結束,今股價開高走高,飆上漲停287元,一舉上漲26元,創歷史新高價。宏碩從5月底起漲,至今漲幅近2倍。 宏碩6月營收2692萬元,月減11.83%、年減32.80%;今年上半年累計營收為1.59億元,年減26.42%,今年第一季每股稅後盈餘0.34元,季減62.64%、年減53.42%。 請繼續往下閱讀... 宏碩系統為高功率真空微波管製造商,主要供應軍用飛彈及雷達系統真空微波管之外,近幾年也跨足半導體製程的商用真空微波管,並供應半導體設備零組件,目前晶圓代工龍頭與荷商半導體設備製造大廠皆已是其設備零組件重要合作夥伴。 宏碩系統受惠軍工題材,即使上半年業績衰退,股價自5月底的96.3元起漲,至今日達287元新高價,漲幅達近2倍。從籌碼面看,外資6月買超179張、自營商買超121張;7月以來,到昨為止,外資雖連7買,但累計7月合計賣超234張,自營商買超217張。 一手掌握經濟脈動 點我訂閱自由財經Youtube頻道 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎...

content: പുല്പള്ളി (വയനാട്): വായ്പ നല്‍കിയ പണം തിരികെ ചോദിച്ചതിന് യുവാവിനെ വിളിച്ചുവരുത്തി സംഘംചേര്‍ന്ന് ആക്രമിച്ചതായും ബലംപ്രയോഗിച്ച് മദ്യം കുടിപ്പിച്ചതായും പരാതി. സംഭവത്തില്‍ കേസെടുത്ത പുല്പള്ളി പോലീസ് രണ്ടുപേരെ അറസ്റ്റുചെയ്തു. പുല്പള്ളി ചെറ്റപ്പാലം സ്വദേശികളായ യോഗിമൂല ബിനു (37), പുത്തന്‍വീട്ടില്‍ രമേശന്‍ (48) എന്നിവരെയാണ് അറസ്റ്റുചെയ്തത്. കോളറാട്ടുകുന്ന് ആണ്ടുവീട്ടില്‍ ഷിന്റോ ബാബുവിന്റെ പരാതിയിലാണ് പോലീസ് കേസെടുത്തത്. ഷിന്റോ സുഹൃത്തായ ചെറ്റപ്പാലം സ്വദേശി മനുവിന് ആറുമാസം മുന്‍പ് 25,000 രൂപ...

title: New Zealand: 'World's rarest whale' washes ashore
content: Spade-toothed whales are the rarest whales in the world. No one knows how many there are or what they eat. It is not even known exactly where they live in the vast southern Pacific Ocean because no sightings have ever been recorded. Scientists may soon be able to solve at least some of those mysteries, however, as the remains of the five-meter (around 16-foot) long creature, a type of beaked whale , were found in New Zealand near a river estuary in the southern province of Otago on July 4. It...

content: – دکتر خدیجه رحمانی متخصص تغذیه درباره انواع نان، نان‌های مرغوب و شیوه نگهداری از نان برای بالا بردن ماندگاری آن می‌گوید: نان‌های صنعتی مشکلی ندارند، تاریخ تولید و انقضاء روی آن‌ها درج شده، به خوبی بسته بندی شده‌ و ویژگی‌های مشخصی دارند. آن دسته از نان‌های صنعتی که روی بسته آن‌ها درج شده نان کامل، بهترین نان‌ها هستند. شرایط این نوع نان‌ها از نظر سلامت و نگهداری مشخص است. title: “いびきに腹立った”同僚ベッド蹴った自衛隊員処分(チバテレ)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 7/17(水) 12:42 配信 チバテレ(千葉テレビ放送) 「いびきがうるさかったことに腹が立った」。 同僚のベッドを蹴った自衛隊員を停職6日の懲戒処分です。 停職6日の懲戒処分を受けたのは陸上自衛隊松戸駐屯地にある需品学校の47歳の2等陸曹です。 松戸駐屯地によりますと、2等陸曹は2023年3月の夜、宿舎の同じ部屋で寝ていた同僚隊員のベッドを足蹴りする暴行を加えました。 同僚隊員にけがはありませんでした。 同僚隊員が上司に報告したことで発覚したもので、2等陸曹は「いびきがうるさかったことに腹が立った」と話しているということです。 需品学校長の柳田常泰陸将補は、「部隊・隊員に対する指導をさらに徹底し、再発防止に努めてまいります」とコメントしています。 チバテレ(千葉テレビ放送)...

title: 6 കോടി ഇംപീരിയൽ ഗാലൻ വെള്ളം ഉൾക്കൊള്ളും; ചെലവ് 15.74 കോടി, ജല ലഭ്യത ഉറപ്പു വരുത്തി ദുബായ്
content: ഇവിടെ പോസ്റ്റു ചെയ്യുന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ മലയാള മനോരമയുടേതല്ല. അഭിപ്രായങ്ങളുടെ പൂർണ ഉത്തരവാദിത്തം രചയിതാവിനായിരിക്കും. കേന്ദ്ര സർക്കാരിന്റെ ഐടി നയപ്രകാരം വ്യക്തി, സമുദായം, മതം, രാജ്യം എന്നിവയ്ക്കെതിരായി അധിക്ഷേപങ്ങളും അശ്ലീല പദപ്രയോഗങ്ങളും നടത്തുന്നത് ശിക്ഷാർഹമായ കുറ്റമാണ്. ഇത്തരം അഭിപ്രായ പ്രകടനത്തിന് നിയമനടപടി കൈക്കൊള്ളുന്നതാണ്.

title: 立院決議邀總統國情報告 卓榮泰:暫時處分未決定 談此事不宜
content: 行政院長卓榮泰與媒體茶敘。(記者廖振輝攝) 〔記者鍾麗華/台北報導〕立法院會昨通過國民黨和民眾黨團所提「邀請總統進行國情報告」決議案,行政院長卓榮泰今(17)日與媒體茶敘時表示,現在暫時處分還沒有做出決定,而且他也聽說,昨天有一些程序瑕疵,目前的狀況,是其不確定性很強,且沒有時間、沒有內容、沒有行為準則,現在談這件事是不宜的。 卓榮泰強調,賴總統對於國情報告,一向是保持着非常開放態度,而且他在競選時也說過了,但是在當時的憲法與「立法院職權行使法」的情景下,不過,現在卻有變動,如果這個變動合法合憲,他想總統也不會有特別意見,但如果變動是違憲的,不可能要求總統違憲。 請繼續往下閱讀... 卓榮泰指出,現在暫時處分還沒做出決定,我們一向認為,暫時處分決定後大家要遵守,否則現在任何動作都有回復困難、有違憲之餘,況且立法院也已經休會了,立法院要總統什麼時候去,他也不知道。而且聽說昨天有一些程序進行當中的瑕疵,但這個是立法院內部的事。 卓榮泰說,依照目前狀況,國情報告的不確定性很強,沒有時間、沒有內容、沒有行爲準則,且在釋憲之前的暫時處分還未決定前,現在談這件事是不宜的。 不用抽 不用搶...

content: പാലക്കാട് :കുത്തൊഴുക്കിൽ ചിറ്റൂർപ്പുഴയ്ക്ക്‌ നടുവിലെ പാറയിൽക്കുടുങ്ങിയ നാലംഗ കുടുംബത്തെ രക്ഷിച്ച് അഗ്നിരക്ഷാസേന. മൈസൂരു ഉനിസൂർ സ്വദേശികളായ കെ. ലക്ഷ്മണൻ (71), ഭാര്യ ദേവി (65), മകൻ സുരേഷ് (32), ലക്ഷ്മണന്റെ കൊച്ചുമകൻ ബി. വിഷ്ണു (19) എന്നിവരാണ് ചൊവ്വാഴ്ച ഉച്ചയ്ക്ക് 12 മണിയോടെ പുഴയ്ക്കുനടുവിലെ പാറയിൽ കുടുങ്ങിയത്. ഒന്നരമണിക്കൂർ നീണ്ട പരിശ്രമത്തിനൊടുവിലാണ് നാലുപേരെയും സുരക്ഷിതമായി കരയ്ക്കെത്തിച്ചത്. കരയിൽനിന്ന് നൂറുമീറ്ററോളം അകലെയായിരുന്നു ഇവർനിന്ന പാറ. ചൊവ്വാഴ്ച രാവിലെ പത്തുമണിയോടെയാണ്...

title: В России создали устройство для быстрой сборки микроэлектроники

creator: vivek panmand
content: ओमानमधील मशिदीत झालेल्या दहशतवादी हल्ल्यात 6 जणांचा मृत्यू झाला आणि 28 हून अधिक जखमी झाले आहेत. ISIS ने या हल्ल्याची जबाबदारी घेतली आहे. सुरक्षा दलांनी तीन दहशतवाद्यांना ठार केले आहे. हल्ल्यावेळी धार्मिक कार्यक्रम चालू होता. दहशतवादाची समस्या केवळ भारताचीच नाही तर संपूर्ण जगच त्रस्त आहे. आता ओमानच्या मशिदीत दहशतवादी हल्ला झाला आहे. या घटनेत काही लोकांनी मशिदीजवळ अंदाधुंद गोळीबार केला ज्यात 6 जणांना आपला जीव गमवावा लागला तर 28 हून अधिक जण जखमी झाल्याची माहिती आहे. जखमींना रुग्णालयात दाखल करण्यात...
